products.product_name: Pura Size 4 Eco-Friendly Diapers (18-31 lbs) Hypoallergenic, Soft Organic Cotton, Sustainable, up to 12 Hours Leak Protection, Allergy UK, Recyclable Packaging, 6 Packs of 22 (132 Diapers)

reviews.name: Elizabeth
reviews.title: Favorite Diapers!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2025
reviews.review: These are my absolute favorite diapers. They fit perfectly, smooth and not bulky. They are very effective and non toxic. I’ve never had a problem with them as far as rashes or any discolor on skin. Great on price especially compared to the clean brands.

reviews.name: Miranda
reviews.title: Best Diapers In The World!!!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2024
reviews.review: In the 11 years of trying natural brands for my two girls with sensitive skin/tactile sensitivities, I have tried many different brands of diapers, with people claiming there are top notch, all natural/eco friendly “quality” diapers. THESE ARE THE BEST. They are silky soft, durable, and one diaper lasts all night. No blow outs during the day, the back of the diaper is long enough so no back blow outs either!! Ny only complaint is that I wish I found them sooner. The wipes are just as great as the diapers and they don’t break the bank! They are affordable. I’m honestly shocked they aren’t selling them at a higher price. I never write reviews but I had to with these. If you are a Mama looking for the best diapers for your babe, look no further. Buy these, you won’t regret it. I promise!!!

reviews.name: Natalie
reviews.title: Best TCF diapers for a little one!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2025
reviews.review: I did a lot of research on diapers before I had my second baby. Pura diapers are the only ones that got my attention the most. I love that they are from Europe, TCF, made with organic cotton, super soft and absorbent. My baby had no diaper rash so far using these diapers. Newborn size has umbilical cord cut out that is super comfy for their little bellies. Definitely recommend

reviews.name: Nicole Trinkl
reviews.title: Love
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2025
reviews.review: We love Pura Diapers. I love that they are TCF and I am not putting harmful chemicals on my kids private areas. These diapers are thin but definitely hold up! They are super soft. I do feel they run bigger in size then others we have tried.

reviews.name: Mauricio
reviews.title: Best clean affordable diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2025
reviews.review: As a first-time mom, I want my daughter to be protected from toxic ingredients that are harmful to her body. After searching for non-toxic and clean brand diapers made from natural materials, I decided to give Pura a chance and I don't regret it: they are super soft, the are true to size, they don't leak and, best of all, they don't cause any irritation to my daughter’s skin for a good price!!… The only thing I’d change is that the other sizes had a wetness indicator like size 1 has.

reviews.name: Twyla Prince
reviews.title: I’m happy!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2025
reviews.review: I really love these diapers! I love the design, fit, and how they don’t smell. They hold up really well. The only issue is the tabs can tear very easily but as long as you don’t pull too hard, it’s not an issue. I’m happy these are eco friendly and are made more naturally!

reviews.name: alyssa
reviews.title: Love these diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2025
reviews.review: I love these diapers. I’ve tried just about all of the better options of diapers and these are my favorite. They retain moisture super well, we rarely have leaks. I’ve used these with both of my babies. I like the basic design on the diapers although I would prefer them all white with no design. The fit is correct. Zero rashes with either baby.

reviews.name: Shaddow
reviews.title: Non toxic diaper
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2025
reviews.review: These are great diapers. So far they are doing really well for my twins. I appreciate the fact that they don't contain toxic chemicals and are made out of more natural materials. They absorb great. No leaks or blowouts. True to size of other name brand diapers. They don't have a gross smell to them like others we have used in the past. My twins also have very sensitive skin so we have changed diaper brands a few times already. So far these have helped their skin heal and there's no blue wetness which is difficult to find without spending a ton of money on them. These are alittle more than other name brands but well worth it without breaking the bank.

reviews.name: Libby L
reviews.title: The best butt covers ever!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2025
reviews.review: The absolute best diapers ever. EVER. Our little one can really fill 'em and we have yet to have a leak or major blowout. We love that these are natural, safe and effective without breaking the bank.

reviews.name: ishakushak
reviews.title: Good value for clean diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2025
reviews.review:
With coterie being very pricey this is the next best thing. I was worried that these wouldn't be as leakproof as pampers swaddlers but they are! Pros- chemical free, cheaper than other premium brands, hold up all night and doesn't leak. Cons- sizing different than traditional diapers so read carefully before buying! Size 2 pampers was size 3 pura.
I've bought these several times and will likely continue using them. Very pleased.

reviews.name: Emilie
reviews.title: Perfection
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2025
reviews.review: I was looking for a TCF diaper after Millie moon diapers changed to ECF. These diapers are amazing and so soft. No issues with leaks ever.

reviews.name: NGOC THANH TRAN
reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2025
reviews.review: This is my 2nd box and I love it, even diaper is full, I can still feel the dryness on my baby's skin which helps prevent the diaper rash compared to others. Reasonable price and eco-friendly

reviews.name: CHRISTOPHER BERG
reviews.title: Great diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2025
reviews.review: Best diapers, so soft, so absorbent, never have leaks or blowouts, been using since the newborn size

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: love these diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2025
reviews.review: Easy to put on. The design is durable and retains moisture especially at the top of the diaper. Great leakage protection. 10/10 recommend

reviews.name: Alycia Carpenter
reviews.title: Good quality, cotton, and safe on the skin
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2025
reviews.review: The best eco-friendly diapers that I found. They are very stretchy and non-irritating to the skin. This product shouldn’t have any better reviews because the design makes it last and the only reason that people would be complaining about it is because they’re leaving the diaper on way too long, which is really bad for your child. Having a cotton diaper protects child skin, and gives them comfort.

reviews.name: Kenjamin franklin
reviews.title: Good diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2025
reviews.review: Bought these for my grandson , would purchase again .

reviews.name: Brendan
reviews.title: Cost effective and clean!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2025
reviews.review: These are great! A lower priced alternative for many popular brands AND cleaner! I call that a win win!

reviews.name: Daniel Culver
reviews.title: Good alternative to cloth diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2025
reviews.review: Typically we use cloth diapers for my daughter since she had an allergy to the disposable diapers we kept trying. We went on a trip out of the country for two weeks and I didn’t want to wash our cloth diapers. These were easier to use. My daughter was 18/19 lb. The size 3 diapers fit her perfectly in length. They did not cause an instant rash like other diapers. If needed I would use them again.

reviews.name: Lo Tinker
reviews.title: This is the diaper for your baby!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2025
reviews.review: This diaper!!! Never getting another! We use cloth during the day but disposable at night or if we are traveling and this one is so perfect for our baby’s sensitive skin. No leaking the next morning when she wakes up after wearing all night. Hardly any blowouts. The design is great! It’s the only reusable I will ever use. We’ve tried them all and this one is superior. I love that there aren’t harsh chemicals and as close to non toxic as a diaper can get.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Great for overnight
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2025
reviews.review: Great for overnight. No leaks

reviews.name: Madelynn Daniel
reviews.title: Favorite diapers!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2025
reviews.review: Love these diapers. They’re affordable, free of all the yuck, and fit well !

reviews.name: Austin Smith
reviews.title: Stops blowout!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2025
reviews.review: Loves the quality of these diapers and have stopped many blow outs! However sizing runs a little big. Had a 9lb baby and size 2 was way too big, now 13 lbs and size 2 fits well.

reviews.name: N Kim
reviews.title: Soft and clean!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2025
reviews.review: I really appreciate the brand’s transparency and how clean the product feels. I especially love that it’s fragrance-free, yet it somehow does an amazing job of keeping bad odors from dirty diapers under control! However, we did experience a few blowouts, which might have been a sign that it was time to size up. Overall, though, I really like it.

reviews.name: Monica
reviews.title: Soft and not bulky
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2024
reviews.review: I have tried quite a few for my toddler in diaper size 4 and now 5. I really liked the dyper brand but I could no longer find them at a good price. (If you are able to afford a composting service I do think it’s worth it and I would recommend dyper or naty). I’m now loyal to these Pura diapers. They are soft, not bulky, and the fit is good. They are simple and work great. I tried the newer sensitive skin Huggies and thought they were overkill on the elastic, frills and poofiness, though maybe they would be good for a heavy wetter. I tried hello bello and they were ok but felt much more plastic-y and stiff. Pampers just not a fan and Bambo nature were ok but quite thin and narrow. Although these Puras are ultimately going to landfill, I like that they are nontoxic and have paper packed . Great buy for a more eco friendly option.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Diapers that do not cause rashes
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2025
reviews.review: We supply diapers to our food pantry clients who have babies and they have reported back to us how wonderful these are. Other brands cause rashes but these are wonderful.

reviews.name: grovetrain2602
reviews.title: Good for baby AND the environment
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2024
reviews.review: While researching diaper brands for my daughter, I wanted something that was not only Non-Toxic for her sensitive skin and effective, but also good for the environment. These diapers are great for the price and I feel good using them because they don't have any toxic chemicals. They work well for our daughter and we have never had a leak. I will continue buying these until she is potty trained.

reviews.name: BeeLeigh
reviews.title: Get these!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2024
reviews.review:
Really love these diapers. They don’t have any scent at all as they are unscented and do not have any fun design on the diaper. Although those are adorable on honest diapers, all that ink can have a chemical smell on some designs.
They cover a lot of the bases on trying to be the most low tox diaper and are so affordable

reviews.name: Britton Flath
reviews.title: Dry all night!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2025
reviews.review: Our family loves these diapers. I have two under two and both my boys have used these diapers for most of their lives. They both have never had a diaper rash and very few blow outs. Can’t recommend enough!

reviews.name: Gabriel Padernal
reviews.title: Recommend
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2025
reviews.review: Love these diapers for my kids. The quality and price is great. They hold a lot of pee and don’t have all the harsh chemicals.

reviews.name: Lisa Beason
reviews.title: No diaper rash!!!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2024
reviews.review: We loved this product and could definitely tell a difference in how the natural ingredients improved her diaper rash. We have tried many types of diapers to help diaper rash and have found this brand is one of the few that help. They are also the cheapest natural brand we have found. They hold moisture well and are lightweight. We loved the packaging noticing even that is from natural ingredients.

reviews.name: kalidassa
reviews.title: My Go-To Disposables
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2024
reviews.review:
I cloth diaper, but just like sometimes you need to use disposable plates, sometimes you need disposable diapers. My babysitters are super grateful!

These are soft, strong, and fit great. They are excellent for my 10-month-old overnight — though I still put a cover over them with a wool insert for peace of mind, as she will occasionally still leak. The use of cotton makes me feel great about putting her in these, since my biggest concern about disposables is unsustainability, but I’ve gotten a strong impression from Pura that they’re really trying to offset that while making it as east as possible for parents.

I will continue to buy these for occasional use until she is potty-trained!

reviews.name: Stacey N.
reviews.title: Great Diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2024
reviews.review:
I wish I still had some to take a picture! They are DO SOFT… some diapers leave marks on my babies from being papery and these are like cloud cotton! They also leave NO DIAPER RASH..
My first daughter gets a rash from many many diapers and these I trust, because she’s never had a rash with these.
Also they are excellent for overnight, haven’t had a leak not once
The only thing that’s kinda weird is some of the closures are flimsy … overall I’d definitely recommend! Especially if you’re just looking for maybe an overnight diaper and buying the smaller pack

reviews.name: Taylor McMahan
reviews.title: My Favorite Diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2024
reviews.review: We found Pura diapers late in the game with my first child, but thankfully before my second arrived. I’ve used them on both kiddos now, and won’t go back to any other disposable. They are the softest, and so absorbent. I was skeptical, based off of some other reviews about absorbency, but these are fantastic. They’re not bulky at all, pretty thin, actually, but they hold up so well. The only thing that I feel could be better in the size 2 is the weight rating, I purchased the size 2 instead of the size 1 because the weight estimates were so close. The size 2 says 7-13lbs. My second baby came out at 8lbs 3oz, 20in tall, and I had to wait until he was around 10lbs before these started fitting properly on him. The first one I ever put on him was right when he was born, and it swallowed him up. He’s over 13lbs now, and they fit well room to grow! I also wish that the larger sizes came with a wetness indicator, but that is not a dealbreaker. My older child has used size 5 and size 6 now, and that is my only critique. I love that they are TCF, and I hope they remain TCF. They don’t carry a scent, which I love. They are also SO affordable. I’ll be using these on all of my kids.

reviews.name: hometeach6
reviews.title: Great diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2024
reviews.review: The best. They are so soft. I had to buy an alternative recently because we ran out of diapers while traveling and they weren’t half as soft as Pura! Great value for a higher end and clean diaper. I will admit they do not have as much capacity as say Huggies, so if your baby is peeing a lot a night I can see how that might be an issue.

reviews.name: MP
reviews.title: Best diapers!!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2024
reviews.review: How are these diapers not more well-known?! They are so soft, not plasticy or crinkly, and even though they are thin, they hold a lot without leaking or blowouts! I love that the design is very light and simple, not overly loud and colorful like some other brands. The price is so much lower than my other favorite brand (Healthy Baby) but these diapers do just as good of a job. Tell your friends!

reviews.name: RDM
reviews.title: Great diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2025
reviews.review: They held up Superior

reviews.name: Ksabb22
reviews.title: Cheapest TCF Diapers I’ve Found!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2024
reviews.review: I wanted a clean TCF diaper with a good price point and this was the best I’ve found! They’re soft, and hold waste really well! I’ve never experienced a blow out with these diapers & my baby seems to have zero issues wearing these. The only issue I have with them is that you can’t find them in stores so you have to order in bulk but that’s a small price to pay for what you actually receive. Absolutely worth it!

reviews.name: Wendy A.
reviews.title: Super soft
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2024
reviews.review: I used to use Huggies Special delivery as my LO has sensitive skin. However Huggies only went to size 6 and so the search for another hypoallergenic diaper went on and so happy to have found these. No rashes = happy baby and mama.

reviews.name: Kim Knight
reviews.title: Favorite Brand
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2024
reviews.review: We’ve used this brand since our preemie could fit into the size 1. Unsure how people have had leaks. We’ve have many a blowout and only leaked when it was time to size up or diaper riffles weren’t pulled out properly. Coupled with the TCF rating, this diapers are perfect. The wings are Velcro and stay put. Very soft but durable. Great value for your money as they’re very price friendly. Our 19lb 10 month old fits in a size 4.

reviews.name: Lash House Amazon Favorites
reviews.title: Softest best diapers hands down!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2024
reviews.review: We absolutely love these diapers! They’re infanitly softer than every other diaper we’ve tried! We’ve NEVER, not once, had a blow out with these diapers. They fit so nicely and the fact that theyre plant based and least harmful for the environment making them the most eco-friendly diapers is a gigantic bonus!! 10/10 on these diapers!

reviews.name: Heather Ann
reviews.title: Overall top diaper pick
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2024
reviews.review: I have spent hours of research on diapers and also tested many brands. The pura brand is TCF and I have read 3rd party testing results on diapers and pura is top rated. Has my baby had blowouts in them, of course, but my baby has blown out in every single brand at this point. Overall the blow outs aren’t that often and less than others. Sizing is a little off but once you get it down it works out. I recommend these diapers and the price is a bonus.

reviews.name: Mariah Ellingwood
reviews.title: Great diapers- was sent wrong size
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2024
reviews.review:
I ordered size 4, but was sent size 6…I’m not returning them, because I’ll use them eventually, but that meant I had to go buy more diapers in the right size at the grocery store, so I was a little annoyed.
These diapers are super soft and comfortable for my baby, and we haven’t had any leaks, diaper rash, or other issues.

reviews.name: Jane
reviews.title: Love love love these!!!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2024
reviews.review:
I wish I knew about this brand early on. I would’ve used them since birth. They are great. Super absorbent, rarely ever soaks through—it’s only happened during night after drinking way too much fluid beforehand. And the fit is perfect. My LO is tall and narrow and these fit perfectly no gaps.

Don’t let the thinness fool you; these nappies can hold A LOT! and they contain the smell pretty well. At first I was skeptical because they looked so thin; I’d been using Terra nappies previously which are thick and bulky, but these worked even better than Terra nappies and are just as soft. I can pack more Pura nappies in my carryon than I can with other brands.

I’ve tried a lot of different eco friendly/sustainable brands: honest, bambo, seventh generation, and terra. They were all good but not great—these on the other hand are FABULOUS!

reviews.name: NFoote
reviews.title: Surprised by quality
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2024
reviews.review:
We normally have an automatic diaper subscription through Everylife Diapers but one month our order was lost by FedEx. We had no choice but to find something comparable while the company worked on getting us another box. I did a little research and stumbled upon Pura diapers. We gave them a try and found out we really liked them. They are super absorbent and fit our son really well. The price point is great and would recommend giving them a try.

In the past we have used Honest, Seventh Generation, Hello Bello and would say Pura is better than all of those.

reviews.name: Paula F.
reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2024
reviews.review: After trying Huggies, Huggies sensitive, pampers, pampers natural, honest, these are the only diapers that didn’t irritate my little one’s bum. We have a keeper!

reviews.name: Bsulzener
reviews.title: The best diapers and I’ve tried them all!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2024
reviews.review:
I have been looking for a TCF diaper that didn’t break the bank and found these! They are sooo soft, absorbent and I love how they fit my daughter. They don’t sag either! Will continue to buy!!

Update: Have been using for over a year and still love them! I have never had issues with leaking or blowouts either. So surprised there are negative reviews for these diapers- take my word for it! They are the best clean diaper you can find for the price and I’ve tried a lot!

reviews.name: DJ
reviews.title: Our Favorite Diaper
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2024
reviews.review: This is my wife and mines favorite diaper for our LO. Pura is on par if not slightly better than Pampers in our experience and easily better than the half a dozen other brands big and small we've tried. Pura is more absorbent than most, soft and has never left a rash or seemed to cause discomfort (LUVS was our worst experience across the board). Wish this brand was more readily available to buy off the shelves in the US.

reviews.name: Ermie
reviews.title: Softest diapers ever, amazing for super sensitive skin
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2024
reviews.review: I am truly happy to have found these diapers for my son. They are wonderful on his sensitive skin. I have never felt a softer diaper than these.!

reviews.name: A_L_Rauch
reviews.title: Favorite Diapers!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2024
reviews.review:
My old favorite used to be Dyper, but the material content changed over time.

These are perfect for us. They absorb well. Quality materials and soft. Great fit & haven’t had any issues with straps breaking.

To Pura: Please please restock the US supply with the 120 count of Size 5

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Wish I knew about these sooner
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2024
reviews.review:
Really liking these so far and am happy with the value and brand overall. Super soft. Will pay attention to absorption. Straps stay put which is a big win. Put them on my baby for the first time today and wish I had found this brand way sooner, but thankful I did at all!

Update:

My family does like these because they leak ;( so had to atop using them which was a bummer.

reviews.name: Brittni Cruz
reviews.title: ELITE Diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2024
reviews.review: These are our favorite diapers by far. They’re soft to the touch. Lightweight. They don’t feel bulky with so much material on my baby. We love how clean in material they are since baby is in diapers 24/7. They hold well to blowouts. When holding them next to a Pampers or Huggies or Honest diaper, the Pura just feel so gentle for their baby skin. Size 1 and 2 have the yellow line that turns blue so you know when the diaper needs a change. Once we sized up to Size 3, we noticed the line is gone. They don’t have a stretch at the waiste line like other brands, but we haven’t found that to be a huge problem with blowouts or a game changer. These are the only diapers we buy now. Price is amazingly competitive.

reviews.name: Dawne
reviews.title: Great product
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2025
reviews.review: Nice

reviews.name: Ali
reviews.title: Best diapers ever!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2024
reviews.review: Having a non-toxic diaper was very important to me when my son was born. I was on the Coterie train from before I ever tested other diapers because I had heard such great things. I have since tried pampers, honest, dyper, coterie, and pura. Coterie was definitely the best out of the first four, but Pura has by and large surpassed! They are just as clean/nontoxic as Coterie, they are as soft as Coterie, but they are even more absorbent, and thinner! The Coteries got bulky, especially once there was pee involved. I was hesitant on the thinness of Pura's, feeling like they couldn't possibly be as good, but they have lasted better over night (12 hours) than the Coteries ever did and aren't as bulky underneath clothes. I had leaks from Coterie several nights in a row until I finally used the Pura overnight and now it's been a week with no leaks. I'm telling you, from a mom who drove herself nuts to have the best, Pura is the best! And like 30-40% cheaper than Coterie thankfully! Couldn't recommend them more, just bought the bulk package cause I am committed!

reviews.name: Clari
reviews.title: Very Absorbent!!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2024
reviews.review: My new favorite diapers! They feel very soft compared to other brands, durable, the adhesive straps are good.These feel more gentle for my baby with sensitive skin. I recommend!

reviews.name: Katie Rushlow
reviews.title: BEST DIAPERS EVER!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2024
reviews.review:
This is a modal window.

No compatible source was found for this media.
I went on the hunt for what felt like forever for clean eco-friendly diapers that didn’t leak. We tried honest, Millie moon, pampers, etc and nothing compared to Kirkland but we weren’t okay with all of the PFAs and chlorine we found in the Kirkland products. So when I heard about pura diapers on Reddit, we decided to try it out. These. Diapers. Are. The. Best! They are sooooo soft and cause no leakage! (Except for when needing to go up a size at night). They are affordable and free of chemicals which puts my mind at ease. We love these diapers and won’t be going back to anything else !

reviews.name: Phoebe Rogers
reviews.title: GREAT for sensitive skin babies
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2024
reviews.review: Bought these in an effort to find quality, soft, allergy sensitive diapers for my daughter who was chronic diaper rash. Not only have her rash gone away, the irritation where the diaper meets her legs is gone and she’s overall a less itchy baby! The Velcro sticks super well, to where it’s no longer easy for my daughter to take it off, and we haven’t had a single blow out. These diapers are quality, economically friendly (especially compared to other “chemical free” brands) and have been a huge game changer at our casa. Will be buying repeatedly.

reviews.name: Rebecca
reviews.title: Great option for low chemical diaper
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2024
reviews.review: I love these diapers. We’ve tried many of the “clean” diapers brands that don’t contain chemicals like chlorine, etc. These diapers are super absorbent and best of all they are really gentle on our baby’s skin. Bonus, they have a cute pattern on them :)

reviews.name: AIzza
reviews.title: My Favorite diapers at the moment
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2024
reviews.review: I appreciate that these diapers feel dry on the outside, making them super comfortable for my almost 3-year-old, who weighs 30 pounds and fits perfectly in size 6. Additionally, they don't sag, which is another feature I really like

reviews.name: Michaela Hess
reviews.title: Quality
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2024
reviews.review: Amazing quality of diapers. Super soft and comfortable. Free of all the nasty dyes and chemicals . Good for babies with a very sensitive booty .

reviews.name: Heather & Gary
reviews.title: Favorite Diapers!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2024
reviews.review: Favorite diapers, clean ingredients, no weird smells, soft, and holds everything in great! Happy to get some clean diapers in the US. Insane that it has to be from the UK, but what more would you expect out of this "great nation" that loves it's toxic chemicals.

reviews.name: Suzie
reviews.title: Softest diaper I’ve ever purchased
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2024
reviews.review: There shouldn’t be any toxic products for babies to begin with but reality says otherwise. After searching through many different products I believe this diaper is the winner so far. I like that it’s non toxic, safe and soft on the sensitive skin.

reviews.name: Sara
reviews.title: Soft and Lasting
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2024
reviews.review: I am always looking for organic products for my baby. These diapers are great. They are a decent price and eco friendly. My baby has no issues with them and they last all night . Will buy again

reviews.name: Charity
reviews.title: Affordable Without Sacrifice
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers perform very well on a busy baby and even overnight. I was hesitant since another clean brand we tried lead to a lot of blowouts. We ordered the size 5 so there is no wetness indicators, but surprisingly, it doesn't bother me. The appearance is cute, gender neutral, and doesn't come up to the bottom of her rib cage. (Again, another brand had very long diapers that didn't seem like a great design choice.) I found the sizing to be on par with the other major brands.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Softest diapers I’ve ever tried!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers check all the boxes for me! These are super soft, absorbent, they hold the big poops that want to go everywhere, and they are a great price! I also love that they are made with clean materials that gives me peace of mind about my baby’s skin.

reviews.name: Grace
reviews.title: My baby’s rash disappeared
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2024
reviews.review: I’ve been using Huggies since he was a new born. Since he started baby food at 6 months of age, he started developing diaper rashes. I switched to Pura diapers and they disappeared in a single day! They have the best affordable price point with safe and soft materials. I repurchased it!

reviews.name: Tachiana Gunness
reviews.title: Great inexpensive clean diaper
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2024
reviews.review:
Low toxic, non toxic is important to me for my little. This is one of the more inexpensive clean diapers available on the market. I wish there wasn’t plastic in the liner but you are getting a great bang for your buck.
Diaper is soft. And I love that there are no dyes for unnecessary patterns.

reviews.name: Rachel Annette
reviews.title: A gift
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2024
reviews.review: Don't know how the diapers work because they are a gift. However they were a good price and the company doesn't support certain causes like Huggies and Pampers do, so I don't feel bad giving them my money.

reviews.name: ✌️
reviews.title: Soft easy to use and cleaner ingredients
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2024
reviews.review: Been comfortable for the toddler to wear, no rashes, or marks from the diapers.

reviews.name: KH87343
reviews.title: After 4 kids, best diapers I have ever purchased.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.review: I have four children and have used every brand of diapers under the sun- Pampers, Huggies, Luvs, Walmart brand, Kroger brand, CVS brand, Aldi brand, Hello Bello- to name a few. Of all these brands, this brand Pura is the most absorbent I have ever used. I used them for the first time with this purchase and they did not leak one time overnight, as nearly every other brand has. I only purchased them because I needed diapers delivered next day and these did so it was totally by chance I used them but I will almost solely rely on them because of how well they worked for overnight use on my children. (I have three under 3, two in diapers full time, one in diapers at night only). These truly were a game changer for night time, held up all night with no leaks. They are soft, comfortable and honestly well worth the money and I definitely am one to try and get the best deal on anything as a parent. Beyond pleased, highly recommend, new favorite diapers for my kids.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Great product
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2024
reviews.review: I bought these for my grandson. My son loves the quality of these diapers and that they are great for the baby.

reviews.name: Erica bersentes
reviews.title: These are better than the big brands
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.review: First if all I am writing this because it important to share something that is safe and effective. These diapers are so much soft the are cotton filled and not full of plastics and gel like the regular big name brands. I was using Costco diapers but I wanted a better cleaner more natural diaper. These do not have the line that shows when it's wet quite frankly I don't care or need it you can tell when it's wet the cotton will swell and it's obvious. They hold big blow outs better than those name brands, my daughter 6 months old now is sleeping 6 plus hrs because they hold so well at night and keep her dry. They also havnt not given her rashes I am sure uts because they are cotton. I LOVE these diapers and affordable to my for the fact that they are so much safer than those big brands. Try then you won't be disappointed.

reviews.name: Allison Dancer
reviews.title: baby shower gift.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2024
reviews.review: I originally found this brand of diapers late in the game with my daughter. We used them for a short period of time. I really wish I would have found them sooner! they are soft, absorbent and no leakage issues. I now buy this brand for all the baby showers I go too! highly recommend. Pricing is affordable too

reviews.name: Diana
reviews.title: Love these
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2024
reviews.review: These are great, natural, and affordable diapers. They are so soft and are durable

reviews.name: C M
reviews.title: Clean ingredient diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2024
reviews.review: Very happy for the value for the money spent on these diapers! They have clean ingredients and hold in all the baby's messes. Diapers fit my newborn very well from birth at 7lbs to currently 10lbs. Adhesive stickiness of the tabs is excellent, as well.

reviews.name: ogrelady
reviews.title: Amazing Eco-Friendly Diapers - Highly Recommended!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2024
reviews.review: I absolutely love these Pura Eco-Friendly Diapers. They are incredibly soft and super absorbent, with hardly any leaks (just the occasional blowout). Despite retaining a lot of liquid, they still feel dry to the touch. The price is fantastic, very close to what I was paying for Pampers, but without any of the plastics and chemicals. I also appreciate that both the packaging and the box are recyclable. My baby hasn't had any diaper rash since we started using them. I only wish I had discovered these sooner!

reviews.name: Kent
reviews.title: Best clean diapers ever!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2024
reviews.review:
So first off I am SUPER picky about diapers. I always used Pampers Pure but then I saw there were some things I didn’t agree with and we had frequent poop leaks on the side too. so then I switched Kudos and I have honestly liked them with the exception that they aren’t the softest, but they are clean ingredients and no blowouts. Then I saw THESE diapers and decided to try since someone said they liked them better than Kudos and I have to say I like them better too!!
Pros vs Kudos waaaay softer and don’t bunch up in the crotch area like Kudos do which does bother my tot.

Cons- more expensive than Kudos, about $30 more a month and no pee indicator which I’m fine with since I found out those aren’t good for baby anyway.

reviews.name: Abbey Road
reviews.title: Love!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2024
reviews.review: Recently started to switch to low toxic household products and hygiene items. Very happy with this switch! My 2.5 month old does well in these diapers.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Best affordable brand
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2024
reviews.review: After thorough research I’ve learned that a lot of popular brand diapers carried a lot of harsh chemicals that can have a long term effect on babies health. I’ve tried many brands and I really enjoyed the price and softness of this one and it’s my favorite. It’s soft and I felt as if it was the most comfy compared to the other safe ingredients options. A negative at first was that it didn’t have the pee strip that changes colors when wet. But at this point after months of using this brand I got over it. lol you can tell when your baby is wet and don’t really need it. Most affordable and comfy for my family and me.

reviews.name: Regan Stahl
reviews.title: Great
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2024
reviews.review: I really like these diapers. They are really thick and soft. My priority and buying diapers was I want them to be nontoxic, in my research, these looks like the best option and had a good price point. The only downfall was the size one diaper was still a little too big for my newborn so we used the honest newborn diapers for the first couple weeks. The honest diapers were thin and irritated my baby’s skin a bit but these don’t at all. A little weird to put on at first but we really like them. Contain poop and pee well.

reviews.name: BB
reviews.title: Great diapers!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2024
reviews.review: Was searching for a low tox diaper that was reasonably priced. Found these. They're really soft and did well. I was using size 2 for my almost 9 lb newborn. It's pretty large though. Ordering size 1 to compare. But overall very happy with them!

reviews.name: Sarah K.
reviews.title: Excellent diapers- No more blowouts!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.review: I have three children and have used many different types of natural as well as conventional diapers. Before these, my preferred diapers were Bambo nature for the clean ingredients and mostly good performance, and Huggies Special Delivery had the best performance with blowouts but I didn't like the ingredients as much. I did not like the Dyper or Andy Pandy- the performance and fit was not as good, and they leaked more easily. The Pura diapers, at first glace, are thinner and have channels which I thought would not hold much. I was wrong. The channels work beautifully- the way the diaper is designed, they are very absorbent, keep baby quite dry, and we haven't had any problems with blowouts. I also really like the clean ingredients and that they are made in Europe. These diapers are definitely a win and are now my go to.

reviews.name: Anise
reviews.title: First Time Parents - So Far Great
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers have been great with our 9 lbs newborn. It has held up well through the meconium poop stage and is great for the new more watery poop coming in. So far, nothing has leaked, and they feel much softer than the pamper ones they gave at the hospital

reviews.name: Cristina_P
reviews.title: The absolute softest diapers we've tried
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2024
reviews.review: We've tried a bunch of the natural style diapers and these are in the top three along with Terra and Nest. The Pura are my favorite but my husband prefers a wetness indicator line so we usually keep a couple of different brands around the house. When we started with natural diapers we started with Dyper and Honest and were unimpressed. The Dyper diapers tended to have leaks and the Honest smelled a little weird and didn't have a comfortable feel to them.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Made with only the good stuff
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2024
reviews.review: Love this brand of diapers! Absolutely love that the diapers are made without fragrance, chlorine or other toxins. This means the world when the diapers are used on our lovely babies skin. I keep ordering these diapers because not only as stated above but also they have an undeniable solid leak protection to them!

reviews.name: Sarah Fowler
reviews.title: So soft
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2024
reviews.review: Finally gave these a try after hearing about their great quality and I have to say I agree! Love the quality. So soft and seem much more comfy for my baby.

reviews.name: Rebekah
reviews.title: So soft!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2024
reviews.review: These work great for a baby! They absorb well and are super soft on a tiny sensitive baby’s skin. We cloth diaper but I use these at night and have had no problems with blowouts or anything like that. My baby will sometimes go two nursing sessions in the night and fall back asleep and these hold without me having to wake her up and change her. The only odd thing is the weight range on these diapers. My daughter is just about 12lbs and the size 2 fit great and she even has room to grow. I got size 3 initially bc she was in that weight range as well and they are huge on her.

reviews.name: MARIA L CARRASCO
reviews.title: Love these diapers!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers have been great for our little one. Since they're cleaner, no rash issues, baby doesn't complain about discomfort, and she can wear for a few hours overnight if wet. Big plus, little line shows when they're wet, which my husband really appreciates.

reviews.name: Co bully mom
reviews.title: Good diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2024
reviews.review: Very good quality

reviews.name: Erik
reviews.title: No outbreaks or blowouts
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2024
reviews.review: The size one diapers fit a little on the bigger size but still contain the blowouts. I love that they are eco-friendly.

reviews.name: Sunshine
reviews.title: Using for my fur baby .
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2024
reviews.review:
I bought these for my female dog who is in heat - I cut a slat for her tail and they work great - after this is over she is getting spayed !
But Im thankful for these little diapers - they work very well !
Not an usual review , Im sure . Lol

reviews.name: Tara Mengel
reviews.title: The BEST diapers!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers are a crunchy mamas dream! I don't understand why they aren't rated 5 stars! Totally chlorine free and organic cotton! They are so soft I joke and say that we are cloth diapering..but seriously it's like wrapping your baby's bum in a cloud! They do run a bit small so I would recommend buying a small pack and making sure the size is right. The diaper is a bit wider than a normal diaper so don't be a knucklehead make sure you apply and fasten it correctly. They are extremely absorbent so if leaks are happening, hate to say it but, user error. These diapers are honestly perfect. Not to be confused with honest brand diapers. Those are booty, pun intended. Now go place your order!

reviews.name: Jordynn Barnes
reviews.title: Super soft
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2024
reviews.review: I love these diapers! They are super soft. My baby never gets a rash in them. They hold a lot of urine. They don’t leak, and she wears them overnight

reviews.name: Crock77
reviews.title: Ours diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2024
reviews.review: Absolutely the very best diaper on the market. They pull the urine away from the baby. If you want the best for your child, buy Pura diapers for your little one.

reviews.name: Sobell
reviews.title: Best diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2024
reviews.review: These blow Honest right out of the water and less expensive. They’re so soft and super absorbent. I like Millie Moon’s too if I need something before these get delivered, but these are more clean. That’s my only issue, I just can’t run out and buy them anywhere.

reviews.name: Emily Howard
reviews.title: My favorite toxin free diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers are the softest diapers I’ve ever felt! The only ones that work on my 2yo’s sensitive skin and keep her from breaking out.

reviews.name: Rebekah
reviews.title: So soft!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2024
reviews.review: These work great for a baby! They absorb well and are super soft on a tiny sensitive baby’s skin. We cloth diaper but I use these at night and have had no problems with blowouts or anything like that. My baby will sometimes go two nursing sessions in the night and fall back asleep and these hold without me having to wake her up and change her. The only odd thing is the weight range on these diapers. My daughter is just about 12lbs and the size 2 fit great and she even has room to grow. I got size 3 initially bc she was in that weight range as well and they are huge on her.

reviews.name: MARIA L CARRASCO
reviews.title: Love these diapers!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers have been great for our little one. Since they're cleaner, no rash issues, baby doesn't complain about discomfort, and she can wear for a few hours overnight if wet. Big plus, little line shows when they're wet, which my husband really appreciates.

reviews.name: Ashley P.
reviews.title: No diaper rashes,
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2025
reviews.review: We’ve been using these for our 4 month old since birth. My only complaint is that they aren’t in stock or take too long to deliver. We were recently going on a trip and Amazon kept delaying the delivery, we had to buy a different brand (Dyper) and our baby instantly got a rash from the ingredients. Pura brand hasn’t caused a single diaper rash, are designed to fit the baby perfectly, and have no chemical smell like other brands. these are our favorite diapers and we will continue to purchase them when they are in stock.

reviews.name: Lauren N.
reviews.title: Soft & pure
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2025
reviews.review: Love how clean these are! They're also very soft and hold a lot of urine. However, not solid poos tend to run out on the sides!

reviews.name: AB
reviews.title: Great diaper, horrible shipping logistics.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2024
reviews.review:
These diapers are what I settled on for my 3rd kid. For reference of my "standards," my first two kids used Cloud Island, which were discontinued a few years ago. These Pura diapers are far more absorbent than you'd expect upon visual inspection. Those lines that look like they've got no filler in them fill up when the filler absorbs pee. I suppose this extra space prevents the diaper from bursting when too full. These feel quite soft and pliable, no rough or stiff parts.

I took a star off not because of the diapers but to point out the inordinately bad shipping logistics of Amazon. I've ordered 3 boxes total so far, only size 1. Of those 3, 1 came in the wrong size, 1 came 1 day late and the next is predicted to come 4 days late. Those second two were part of a subscription and so you'd expect them to be on time with the rest of your subscription items.

So....great diaper, order at least a week ahead of time.

reviews.name: Gaby Ruiz
reviews.title: Okay
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2025
reviews.review: Love the ingredients and the softness of this diaper but they sag

reviews.name: cindy
reviews.title: Quality control issue?
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2025
reviews.review: 4/5 of the packs in the box were great. One of the packs of diapers didn't work well. The bed got wet every night we used them. (We only use disposables at night) Seems like the elastic on the lower legs was loose. Love the paper packaging though.

reviews.name: Paige
reviews.title: soooo soft
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2025
reviews.review: i originally tried these looking for a brand with better quality ingredients and a friend recommended these. they really are so much softer than the other brands we’ve tried. my only complaint is that there is no “poop catcher” flap on the back of the diapers if baby has a blowout that goes up the back haha. but otherwise we are sticking with these!

reviews.name: Brooke Lynn
reviews.title: Great ingredients, so soft and comfy
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2025
reviews.review: These are great for my baby who has eczema and gets bad spots with other brands that aren't soft. However they don't fit her the best, she is not a chunky one so I think that's the issue. But otherwise we loved them. Very amazing that they are more economical friendly and I'm so happy with the ingredients

reviews.name: Jen B
reviews.title: Affordable, Free of Harmful Chemical Diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2025
reviews.review: Pura diapers are great! How are they not more popular? They are super absorbent, free of harmful chemicals and works great overnight. Although, they are pretty thin, they catch all the blowouts (including the back) and the price is very affordable. The only downfall is that there is no wet indicator on the diaper like there is with other diaper brands and elastic waistband.

reviews.name: Melissa
reviews.title: Soft and affordable
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2024
reviews.review: I really liked how soft these diapers are compared to others I tried. I’ve tried Huggies, pampers, honest, parasol and targets brand. So far these are probably the softest and haven’t given my son a rash which he got with Huggies, pampers and parasol because the diaper sticks to his skin once it’s wet. I’ve had a couple leaks with this diaper so not 100% sure if I’ll use it. Going to try out a couple more but these are definitely worth a shot and will probably use if I don’t find any other better brands.also, they run small. I noticed my son’s legs were getting a little red because of it so I decided to size up. Hopefully that was the only reason they were red.

reviews.name: Mary B.
reviews.title: Sizing issues
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2024
reviews.review: For starters these are our go to diapers since our daughter came home from the hospital. They are so very soft, totally chlorine free, and budget friendly. Sizing is off though. A size 1 was huge on her at 6lbs 4oz but we were able to roll them to make them fit. I think a 4lb baby would be swimming in them. Then it was time to size up as the 1s were getting too small at almost 3 months old. So we went to size 2s only to find out they are basically the exact same size but only about an inch higher in rise when fully stretched. The pictures show how width doesn’t change on front or back which is needed for growing waists. So if you max out size 1s, jump straight to size 3s. Hoping I can return this giant box of 2s as they won’t fit.

reviews.name: Adriana
reviews.title: They look big but
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2024
reviews.review:
When I first opened the box I thought there’s no way these are newborn diapers. However, once on they did a great job in containing everything.
They are very soft and seem to be gentle in the skin. I wouldn’t give them 5 stars because of the sizing but definitely would consider buying again.

reviews.name: KendraKat
reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2024
reviews.review: We’ve been using Pura diapers since our baby was a newborn, she’s five months now. They’ve worked well enough, no irritation and I love how natural and nontoxic they are. However, I recently came across a clearance box of Honest diapers and decided to give them a try. Holy moly are they absorbent! Our baby is exclusively breastfed and still has fairly watery stools. With the Pura diapers the liquid poo just sits on top of the diaper and it’s a pretty messy ordeal to change her. We’ve had a handful of blowouts and now I understand why. With the Honest diapers they absorb EVERYTHING (even BF stool), leaving nothing to leak outside the diaper. I’m going to use up the rest of my Pura and make the switch to Honest. Both brands run small, size comparison shows both size 3’s to be the same for both brands (although slightly more waist room in the Honest) but the weight range is much less for Pura. I’m not mad we tried this brand and I was happy with them until I realized things could be so much better than they were, so don’t hesitate to give them a try. If your baby has solid stools I think these would work great. We’ve also never had a pee soaked diaper leak so they are great for that too!

reviews.name: Anyhoodles
reviews.title: I like the diapers, but sizing is weird.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2024
reviews.review:
I’m mostly happy with these diapers. I like the option of a relatively “clean” total chlorine free diaper at a reasonable price.
But the size 1 (newborn size) was huge on my 7lb 6oz baby, the velcro tabs overlapped quite a bit. I can’t imagine what it would look like on a 4lb baby as that’s the size it’s advertised for. My baby is currently 10lbs and still wearing the size 1, velcro tabs still overlap a little, but we’re having more leaks so I purchased the size 2. Don’t even bother buying the size 2, there is virtually no difference between the sizes. Maybe 1/8” in length.
Pic 1 is size 1 and 2 next to each other, pic 2 is size 1 on top of size two, you can barely see the diaper under it. And pic 3 is comparing size 1 Pura to a size 1 Pamper diaper. I wish I had a newborn pamper to compare, as it’s a lot smaller than the Pura.
Overall, I’d still recommend these. But just be aware they may not fit right away, and probably don’t stock up too much on various sizes.

reviews.name: Wejdan
reviews.title: I love this product just don’t buy it from Amazon get them from Walmart
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2024
reviews.review:
These diapers are amazing, no leaks so soft and free of chlorine and any harmful chemicals.

Amazon is the only problem here, there is always an issue with my delivery, they always send the wrong size with every delivery or they don’t deliver it on time if you have the subscription, it’s really annoying and every time I call and complain and nothing happened
Just save your time and avoid the headache and order these diapers from Walmart because they have a better customer service and never send the wrong item or have delays.

reviews.name: Miranda
reviews.title: Finally, a affordable nontoxic diaper
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2024
reviews.review: I have been looking for affordable clean, ingredient, diaper for my Little! These diapers are so soft. I appreciate the material that is used to make them. The only complaint I would have is that there is a smell when she pees in them. But from my experience this is common with a clean diaper like these

reviews.name: Cherie
reviews.title: Constantly send the wrong size
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2024
reviews.review:
I love this brand, but 3 times now I have gotten the wrong size. It is a moot point to love the diapers if they're not going to fit my children and I have to keep sending them back and buying other brands at the store anyway.

That said, I would give the diapers themselves 5 stars of not for that issue because they are are great! So soft, no leaks or blow outs, no rashes on my babies' skin. They're designed for comfort and they're worth the cost. They hold a lot and stay fastened! All in all if you can deal with frequently returning for the correct size, they're worth it!

reviews.name: Amelia
reviews.title: Big for my 9lb newborn
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2025
reviews.review: Nice diapers, similar to any other similar. Bigger than other newborn size diapers

reviews.name: goddess_reyna
reviews.title: Great diapers. Wrong diaper size.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2024
reviews.review: I love this diapers if I only I could get them delivered. They keep sending me the wrong diaper size. Even when they tried to fix it and replce the exact same order the wrong ones again. I would use this diapers if I could rely on Amazon. Otherwise I have to go with another brand an through Target Same-Day delivery 😒

reviews.name: vladimir zadneprovskiy
reviews.title: Wrong size sent
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2024
reviews.review: Okay, love these diapers but I don’t understand how someone can keep sending me the wrong size. I keep buying size 5 because I need size 5 but I was sent size 7 two times and this time size 2. Like how hard is it to send me the correct size?? But the product itself is great. Just please send me size 5!

reviews.name: Pure Grace Design Co.
reviews.title: Run large
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers are nice but run very large. My daughter is 8.5lbs and these diapers are very large on her! Luckily she’ll grow into them but I would not get them if your baby is less than 8.5lbs!

reviews.name: Kay.
reviews.title: Run small
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2024
reviews.review: They run small but so soft and holds well

reviews.name: cortney
reviews.title: No good for poops
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2024
reviews.review: Great for pee. I love the quality, BUT these diapers DO NOT help keep breastfed babies poop in. I ALWAYS have blow outs. I use these when i think he’s done pooping for the day! Lol

reviews.name: Di Zafurova
reviews.title: Softest most absorbing diapers!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2024
reviews.review: These are one of the best diapers I have ever used! I used to use all types of diapers with my 1st and decided that pampers pure was my favorite, until I tried Coterie with my 2nd baby. Coterie was by far the best when it comes to fit, softness, and absorbency. These diapers (Pura) are my absolute favorite because they are clean, made without any chlorine and all the chemicals which exist in most American diapers. The only problem I have with these is that they don’t have the best fit which caused some leaks. My son wears size 3 and as the sizes increased I noticed more leaks because of the fit. Otherwise, if these diapers had elastics and a better fit they would be the most superior. Not once, even after a 10+ hour sleep, have they been wet when I opened to change my baby! He always stays super dry in these and if it wasn’t for the fit they would be better than Coterie. Unfortunately I have to go back to Coterie because the diapers moves a lot as my baby grows. The price is also perfect, costs less than most big brand diapers while outperforming. I wish they work on it and make it more snuggly, because I can’t wait to switch these with my coterie diapers.

reviews.name: Elilove
reviews.title: Super soft
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2024
reviews.review: The first thing I noticed about these diapers is how soft they are compared to the current Huggies brand I was using. They do keep baby's skin dry to touch. Unfortunately I wanted to use them overnight but they came off completely two times and I don't feel like they are strong enough to last the night with a toddler. My daughter sleeps with a sleep sack on and one morning the diaper was by her feet and she was soaked and another time one of the straps came off and she was a little wet by the time I checked her diaper in the morning. The straps also do not have grip all the way to tip where you pull it its missing the grip part not sure why. However, despite my bad experience overnight, I will order a size bigger next time for my toddler and give it another try. I am definitely going to buy these again for my newborn and give them a try just because I love how soft they are (:

reviews.name: Sumitra Shrestha
reviews.title: Not a big fan
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2024
reviews.review: I don’t think I’d buy this brand again as it gave rashes to my daughter

reviews.name: Shopper123
reviews.title: Decent, clean option
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2024
reviews.review:
PRO:
- Clean. Per Mamavation’s testing, inside non-detect organic fluorine, outside non-detect organic fluorine. Fluorine is the indicator used to detect PFAS, forever chemicals.
- Made in Europe.
- Affordable, especially for a clean brand.
- Lays flat when open, making diaper changes a little easier. Personally, I hate Huggies because it bunches and curls when I’m trying to slide it under baby for diaper changes.

CON:
Not as absorbent as others. My baby peed and pooped in them over the course of a 2 hour period and I felt like it was at max capacity. Definitely not as absorbent as Coterie, Pampers Pure or Rascals, which are my three preferred diapers for a variety of reasons.

reviews.name: Christyn Garber
reviews.title: Great TCF diaper choice
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2024
reviews.review: Size 1 did not fit my 6.5 pound baby until around 8 pounds, so I would definitely not recommend for a 4-7 pound baby. Diapers are fluffy and cute, no leaks or blowouts (though we don't regularly use disposables and use EC part time), and fit well now that baby is at the upper weight range. Price and availability is great compared to some other TCF brands. The tabs stick very strong so repositioning them can be a pain and end up tearing up the diaper a little bit. Diapers tend to slip down a little on my baby with movement and these are no exception. Will probably buy again next time because of price and ease of access!

reviews.name: Lay
reviews.title: Good
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2024
reviews.review: Soft good quality diapers.. they just run small is only downside

reviews.name: jazzmin
reviews.title: Run small
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2024
reviews.review: Good quality very soft. They run small in size other wise great diapers. They are absorbing and baby loves them .

reviews.name: M
reviews.title: Received the wrong size
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2024
reviews.review: I ordered a box of size 3 but received size 7. Still giving 4 stars because I’ve used these before and liked them.

reviews.name: Hannah G
reviews.title: Good but leaks overnight
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2024
reviews.review: Overall these diapers are great! They hold solids and liquids pretty well, but they do leak overnight. My baby didn’t have any skin irritation. The size is pretty spot on for my babies weight going by their weight chart. They feel pretty durable as well, just wish they held more liquid overnight.

reviews.name: Erin Michelle Engstrom
reviews.title: Fantastic Diaper!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2024
reviews.review: Love that it’s TCF, soft, and safe. The price point for the large pack is awesome and we will keep using these for future babies too. The main cons are they are not the most soft (still soft but Amazon’s diapers with the bear - Gentle Mama?? are softer) and they run a little small in my opinion. Not as small as Honest diapers, but not consistent with other brands (Mollie Moon, Huggies, Costco).

reviews.name: Beck
reviews.title: So soft
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers are so soft. I was looking for an alternative to the diapers that I was using and these are great quality. They never gave my toddler a rash and he didn’t mind wearing them at all. The one issue I encountered is that where ever the pee landed it stayed. It kept them from leaking which is excellent, but it made them sag a little more than what I had previously used. Over all I would buy them again and think they are nice quality.

reviews.name: Meredith A.
reviews.title: Good but not amazing
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2024
reviews.review: I bought these when I ran out of my Kudos diapers. I do like that they are soft and stretchy and non toxic. But they aren't as absorbent as the Kudos brand. I wouldn't trust them for overnight. But they are great as a backup diaper and a great affordable option.

reviews.name: Abbigail Tygart
reviews.title: A good nontoxic option
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2024
reviews.review: I thought these were really soft on my baby’s bottom! Sometimes the material seemed to shed though.

reviews.name: adrina
reviews.title: Love these
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2024
reviews.review: I really like these diapers, they are super soft. I wouldn't use them for overnight, we have had leaks.

reviews.name: Christine
reviews.title: Absorbent and Soft Diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2024
reviews.review: I like Pura diapers for my baby. I really like the softness of these diapers, and I think they are very comfortable for my baby to wear. They have great absorbency for 12 hours. However, I do wish they had a wetness indicator.

reviews.name: Daniel
reviews.title: Best non toxic diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2024
reviews.review: I am so glad I found these diapers. They are inexpensive and work very well for my toddler. She has not had any leaks with these, as soon as we used honest diapers again leak after leak each night. We’ve been using Honest at the moment because these have been out of stock for a few weeks. Only downside!!

reviews.name: Mari D
reviews.title: Great diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers are perfect especially for my busy toddler and newborn. There is no powdery smell like many other baby products. My children fit comfortably in them and even after my toddler soils them while playing for extended periods, they hold up well. We haven’t had any blowouts or leaks and there doesn’t seem to be anything added making them irritable to their skin.

reviews.name: Anna
reviews.title: Very soft, natural-feeling, but gape at back
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2024
reviews.review: I love how natural these feel, very soft, no scent. Baby doesn’t get rashes while using. But they do gape out at the back. Unlike other brands that are stretchy/cinched at the back these are not. If baby isn’t wearing clothing and is sitting up you get a very clear view down the back of the diaper! Would love a poo pocket added here and some cinching to hold “stuff” in.

reviews.name: Macy
reviews.title: Not a bad choice
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2024
reviews.review: Loved how soft these were, and the price can’t be beat. My biggest complaint is as soon as my baby peed I could smell it, which isn’t a terrible thing that’s how I knew she needed changed since there is no stripe but the smell was too much. Plus we had two blowouts in these compared to a similar brand.

reviews.name: Taylor McEntire
reviews.title: Very soft
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers are so soft. I wanted to love them but poop consistently comes out the leg holes. I love that they are non toxic, so it might just be the trade off.

reviews.name: Marsue
reviews.title: Okay
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2024
reviews.review: Great quality, but didn't love how thin they seemed. Didn't seem to hold as much as others I have tried fpr my baby. I did like that they are a cleaner option!

reviews.name: Santastically Yours
reviews.title: No overflow!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2024
reviews.review: I got a size 6 for my 18month old nephew of average size. It has kept the messiness of "messes" In and good for overnight duty!

reviews.name: Wat
reviews.title: Love them
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2024
reviews.review: Love that these are TCF, very absorbent, only thing I’d wish they’d do is put a little line of material on the inside above the buttcheek area to help prevent blowouts. Almost every poop is a blowout if my child is on her back-whether in her swing, car seat, or flat on her back.

reviews.name: Noelle Kirschman_Flores
reviews.title: Best diapers ever!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2024
reviews.review: My son and I absolutely love these diapers!! They are so soft and way more comfortable than the name brand ones from the store. Would give a 5 star but was shipped a size 5 when I ordered a size 2 and I ordered ahead where I’d receive them in time right before I ran out but instead now I have to go return and buy other diapers from the store. A little disappointed but other than that no complaints about the diapers themselves. Also they work great for over night sleep. So no buying day and night diapers or doubling up.

reviews.name: MzMaxxy
reviews.title: Not Bad
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2024
reviews.review: Sizing is pretty good. My little one is getting into a size 3 so these work but we would need to go up to the next size. They feel different, lighter and thinner than most diapers we have tried. I was hesitant to use them overnight but no leaks. Because they are thinner, putting them on can be tricky but I got use to it.

reviews.name: Verified buyer
reviews.title: PRETTY GOOD
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2024
reviews.review: I was not expecting to like these because my first thought when I saw these were "they are too THIN! They are thin but they actually do hold a lot, they can overload at night and leak but throughout the day they are excellent and hold a lot of pee. They are very soft and feel like COTTON! I love these on my baby and will definitely be re purchasing.

reviews.name: Sydney
reviews.title: Soft diaper!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2024
reviews.review: Super soft diaper! It felt more true to size than the diapers we were using previously. Held up really well, but the diaper does become almost translucent when full which made me think it was too full- and we change very regularly. My son has super sensitive skin and these didn’t irritate him at all.

reviews.name: L
reviews.title: Missing Indicator mark in diaper
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2024
reviews.review: There is no indicator line in an any of the size 3. It’s difficult to identify whether if it is a wet diaper or not.

reviews.name: Bob Moynihan
reviews.title: Clean diaper
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2024
reviews.review: Chose this product for its non toxic ingredients especially being totally chlorine free since it is in constant contact with babies skin. We have no rashes or redness since starting this brand & will continue to purchase. They feel thin compared to other diapers on the market but fit great & can hold a large amount, they perform very well with mobile babies. There is no scent to these which we appreciate

reviews.name: Juan C.
reviews.title: Favorite
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2024
reviews.review: I love these diapers! Barely any blowout or leaks! Clean diapers, my only complaint is that there is no wet line indicator

reviews.name: Felicity Bryan
reviews.title: Great but..
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers are extremely soft and TCF with clean ingredients however it’s annoying they stop including the wetness indicator line starting at size 3. If anything, I need the indicator line as they’re older since they can go longer in between changes. I’d say they’re extremely absorbent but if you don’t have the right size the babes have blowouts easily

reviews.name: Briana MacKenzie
reviews.title: Very soft
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2024
reviews.review: I am trying these diaper after honest diaper moved away from tcf. I love how soft these diapers are but I feel like they are very wide and I have a hard time getting them on my baby snuggly. I don’t know if a bigger size would be more proportional but overall I like these diapers and have purchased them in a larger size for future use.

reviews.name: Von The Flower
reviews.title: Budget Friendly
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2024
reviews.review: I usually purchase a more expensive eco friendly brand. These diapers are the next best thing…High performance, does sag after usage so the appearance isn’t great; but I’m glad the product had no effect on my daughter’s sensitive skin.

reviews.name: Roaringharp
reviews.title: Love these diapers!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2024
reviews.review: I really like these diapers. They are toxin free with a good price point and very soft! I would prefer if they were plain white but it's hard to come across plain disposable diapers. They have decent thickness and are pretty absorbent. My son still gets rashes but that may not be because of the diaper. I also love that they come in a paper bag that I can recycle, so it's environmentally friendly 😃

reviews.name: Viktoriya Deleanu
reviews.title: Good quality
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2024
reviews.review: Love these diapers for their ingredients, but they don’t stay dry as long as some of the other brands with bad ingredients. Need diaper change more often.

reviews.name: Ruby Santana
reviews.title: Good in a pinch.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2024
reviews.review: Had these delivered straight to my babysitters house when she ran out last minute. No complaints. Held together and didn’t leak.

reviews.name: Madison
reviews.title: Very soft
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2024
reviews.review: Incredibly soft diapers. I wouldn't recommend as overnight diapers if you have a baby who sleeps a bit longer. Otherwise, I think they're a relatively good diaper, especially for being organic. Only complaint is that I felt the fit on my specific baby wasn't perfect so the Velcro part sat a little low (even with adjustment) causing it to sometimes dig into my baby's thigh.

reviews.name: tiffany torrisi
reviews.title: Decent price good materials
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2024
reviews.review: When I bought these I felt like they were a decent price and decent materials, however once my son used them he would complain about them itching between his legs had to stop using. Other than that, for the time that he did use them, we did not experience any leaks etc.

reviews.name: Ellen Spangler
reviews.title: Quality clean diaper for lowest price
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2024
reviews.review: Truly clean diapers can be so expensive but these are a quality diaper for an affordable price! The fit can be tricky to figure out - they run a little small compared to other brands the same size. If they’re too small they will leak a lot. But once you get size right they work great!

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Works okay
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2024
reviews.review: We love that these diapers are non toxic and works well for sensitive skin. My only complaint is that they don’t work well for toddlers who are on the go all the time…they leak way too much. If they had a snugger waist band/fit they would be the best diaper

reviews.name: Mariz
reviews.title: Un poco decepcionada
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2024
