reviews.name: Sobell
reviews.title: Best diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2024
reviews.review: These blow Honest right out of the water and less expensive. They’re so soft and super absorbent. I like Millie Moon’s too if I need something before these get delivered, but these are more clean. That’s my only issue, I just can’t run out and buy them anywhere.

reviews.name: Emily Howard
reviews.title: My favorite toxin free diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers are the softest diapers I’ve ever felt! The only ones that work on my 2yo’s sensitive skin and keep her from breaking out.

reviews.name: Rebekah
reviews.title: So soft!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2024
reviews.review: These work great for a baby! They absorb well and are super soft on a tiny sensitive baby’s skin. We cloth diaper but I use these at night and have had no problems with blowouts or anything like that. My baby will sometimes go two nursing sessions in the night and fall back asleep and these hold without me having to wake her up and change her. The only odd thing is the weight range on these diapers. My daughter is just about 12lbs and the size 2 fit great and she even has room to grow. I got size 3 initially bc she was in that weight range as well and they are huge on her.

reviews.name: MARIA L CARRASCO
reviews.title: Love these diapers!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers have been great for our little one. Since they're cleaner, no rash issues, baby doesn't complain about discomfort, and she can wear for a few hours overnight if wet. Big plus, little line shows when they're wet, which my husband really appreciates.

reviews.name: Ashley P.
reviews.title: No diaper rashes,
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2025
reviews.review: We’ve been using these for our 4 month old since birth. My only complaint is that they aren’t in stock or take too long to deliver. We were recently going on a trip and Amazon kept delaying the delivery, we had to buy a different brand (Dyper) and our baby instantly got a rash from the ingredients. Pura brand hasn’t caused a single diaper rash, are designed to fit the baby perfectly, and have no chemical smell like other brands. these are our favorite diapers and we will continue to purchase them when they are in stock.

reviews.name: Lauren N.
reviews.title: Soft & pure
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2025
reviews.review: Love how clean these are! They're also very soft and hold a lot of urine. However, not solid poos tend to run out on the sides!

reviews.name: AB
reviews.title: Great diaper, horrible shipping logistics.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2024
reviews.review:
These diapers are what I settled on for my 3rd kid. For reference of my "standards," my first two kids used Cloud Island, which were discontinued a few years ago. These Pura diapers are far more absorbent than you'd expect upon visual inspection. Those lines that look like they've got no filler in them fill up when the filler absorbs pee. I suppose this extra space prevents the diaper from bursting when too full. These feel quite soft and pliable, no rough or stiff parts.

I took a star off not because of the diapers but to point out the inordinately bad shipping logistics of Amazon. I've ordered 3 boxes total so far, only size 1. Of those 3, 1 came in the wrong size, 1 came 1 day late and the next is predicted to come 4 days late. Those second two were part of a subscription and so you'd expect them to be on time with the rest of your subscription items.

So....great diaper, order at least a week ahead of time.

reviews.name: Gaby Ruiz
reviews.title: Okay
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2025
reviews.review: Love the ingredients and the softness of this diaper but they sag

reviews.name: cindy
reviews.title: Quality control issue?
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2025
reviews.review: 4/5 of the packs in the box were great. One of the packs of diapers didn't work well. The bed got wet every night we used them. (We only use disposables at night) Seems like the elastic on the lower legs was loose. Love the paper packaging though.

reviews.name: Paige
reviews.title: soooo soft
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2025
reviews.review: i originally tried these looking for a brand with better quality ingredients and a friend recommended these. they really are so much softer than the other brands we’ve tried. my only complaint is that there is no “poop catcher” flap on the back of the diapers if baby has a blowout that goes up the back haha. but otherwise we are sticking with these!

reviews.name: Brooke Lynn
reviews.title: Great ingredients, so soft and comfy
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2025
reviews.review: These are great for my baby who has eczema and gets bad spots with other brands that aren't soft. However they don't fit her the best, she is not a chunky one so I think that's the issue. But otherwise we loved them. Very amazing that they are more economical friendly and I'm so happy with the ingredients

reviews.name: Jen B
reviews.title: Affordable, Free of Harmful Chemical Diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2025
reviews.review: Pura diapers are great! How are they not more popular? They are super absorbent, free of harmful chemicals and works great overnight. Although, they are pretty thin, they catch all the blowouts (including the back) and the price is very affordable. The only downfall is that there is no wet indicator on the diaper like there is with other diaper brands and elastic waistband.

reviews.name: Melissa
reviews.title: Soft and affordable
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2024
reviews.review: I really liked how soft these diapers are compared to others I tried. I’ve tried Huggies, pampers, honest, parasol and targets brand. So far these are probably the softest and haven’t given my son a rash which he got with Huggies, pampers and parasol because the diaper sticks to his skin once it’s wet. I’ve had a couple leaks with this diaper so not 100% sure if I’ll use it. Going to try out a couple more but these are definitely worth a shot and will probably use if I don’t find any other better brands.also, they run small. I noticed my son’s legs were getting a little red because of it so I decided to size up. Hopefully that was the only reason they were red.

reviews.name: Mary B.
reviews.title: Sizing issues
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2024
reviews.review: For starters these are our go to diapers since our daughter came home from the hospital. They are so very soft, totally chlorine free, and budget friendly. Sizing is off though. A size 1 was huge on her at 6lbs 4oz but we were able to roll them to make them fit. I think a 4lb baby would be swimming in them. Then it was time to size up as the 1s were getting too small at almost 3 months old. So we went to size 2s only to find out they are basically the exact same size but only about an inch higher in rise when fully stretched. The pictures show how width doesn’t change on front or back which is needed for growing waists. So if you max out size 1s, jump straight to size 3s. Hoping I can return this giant box of 2s as they won’t fit.

reviews.name: Adriana
reviews.title: They look big but
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2024
reviews.review:
When I first opened the box I thought there’s no way these are newborn diapers. However, once on they did a great job in containing everything.
They are very soft and seem to be gentle in the skin. I wouldn’t give them 5 stars because of the sizing but definitely would consider buying again.

reviews.name: KendraKat
reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2024
reviews.review: We’ve been using Pura diapers since our baby was a newborn, she’s five months now. They’ve worked well enough, no irritation and I love how natural and nontoxic they are. However, I recently came across a clearance box of Honest diapers and decided to give them a try. Holy moly are they absorbent! Our baby is exclusively breastfed and still has fairly watery stools. With the Pura diapers the liquid poo just sits on top of the diaper and it’s a pretty messy ordeal to change her. We’ve had a handful of blowouts and now I understand why. With the Honest diapers they absorb EVERYTHING (even BF stool), leaving nothing to leak outside the diaper. I’m going to use up the rest of my Pura and make the switch to Honest. Both brands run small, size comparison shows both size 3’s to be the same for both brands (although slightly more waist room in the Honest) but the weight range is much less for Pura. I’m not mad we tried this brand and I was happy with them until I realized things could be so much better than they were, so don’t hesitate to give them a try. If your baby has solid stools I think these would work great. We’ve also never had a pee soaked diaper leak so they are great for that too!

reviews.name: Anyhoodles
reviews.title: I like the diapers, but sizing is weird.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2024
reviews.review:
I’m mostly happy with these diapers. I like the option of a relatively “clean” total chlorine free diaper at a reasonable price.
But the size 1 (newborn size) was huge on my 7lb 6oz baby, the velcro tabs overlapped quite a bit. I can’t imagine what it would look like on a 4lb baby as that’s the size it’s advertised for. My baby is currently 10lbs and still wearing the size 1, velcro tabs still overlap a little, but we’re having more leaks so I purchased the size 2. Don’t even bother buying the size 2, there is virtually no difference between the sizes. Maybe 1/8” in length.
Pic 1 is size 1 and 2 next to each other, pic 2 is size 1 on top of size two, you can barely see the diaper under it. And pic 3 is comparing size 1 Pura to a size 1 Pamper diaper. I wish I had a newborn pamper to compare, as it’s a lot smaller than the Pura.
Overall, I’d still recommend these. But just be aware they may not fit right away, and probably don’t stock up too much on various sizes.

reviews.name: Wejdan
reviews.title: I love this product just don’t buy it from Amazon get them from Walmart
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2024
reviews.review:
These diapers are amazing, no leaks so soft and free of chlorine and any harmful chemicals.

Amazon is the only problem here, there is always an issue with my delivery, they always send the wrong size with every delivery or they don’t deliver it on time if you have the subscription, it’s really annoying and every time I call and complain and nothing happened
Just save your time and avoid the headache and order these diapers from Walmart because they have a better customer service and never send the wrong item or have delays.

reviews.name: Miranda
reviews.title: Finally, a affordable nontoxic diaper
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2024
reviews.review: I have been looking for affordable clean, ingredient, diaper for my Little! These diapers are so soft. I appreciate the material that is used to make them. The only complaint I would have is that there is a smell when she pees in them. But from my experience this is common with a clean diaper like these

reviews.name: Cherie
reviews.title: Constantly send the wrong size
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2024
reviews.review:
I love this brand, but 3 times now I have gotten the wrong size. It is a moot point to love the diapers if they're not going to fit my children and I have to keep sending them back and buying other brands at the store anyway.

That said, I would give the diapers themselves 5 stars of not for that issue because they are are great! So soft, no leaks or blow outs, no rashes on my babies' skin. They're designed for comfort and they're worth the cost. They hold a lot and stay fastened! All in all if you can deal with frequently returning for the correct size, they're worth it!

reviews.name: Amelia
reviews.title: Big for my 9lb newborn
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2025
reviews.review: Nice diapers, similar to any other similar. Bigger than other newborn size diapers

reviews.name: goddess_reyna
reviews.title: Great diapers. Wrong diaper size.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2024
reviews.review: I love this diapers if I only I could get them delivered. They keep sending me the wrong diaper size. Even when they tried to fix it and replce the exact same order the wrong ones again. I would use this diapers if I could rely on Amazon. Otherwise I have to go with another brand an through Target Same-Day delivery 😒

reviews.name: vladimir zadneprovskiy
reviews.title: Wrong size sent
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2024
reviews.review: Okay, love these diapers but I don’t understand how someone can keep sending me the wrong size. I keep buying size 5 because I need size 5 but I was sent size 7 two times and this time size 2. Like how hard is it to send me the correct size?? But the product itself is great. Just please send me size 5!

reviews.name: Pure Grace Design Co.
reviews.title: Run large
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers are nice but run very large. My daughter is 8.5lbs and these diapers are very large on her! Luckily she’ll grow into them but I would not get them if your baby is less than 8.5lbs!

reviews.name: Kay.
reviews.title: Run small
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2024
reviews.review: They run small but so soft and holds well

reviews.name: cortney
reviews.title: No good for poops
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2024
reviews.review: Great for pee. I love the quality, BUT these diapers DO NOT help keep breastfed babies poop in. I ALWAYS have blow outs. I use these when i think he’s done pooping for the day! Lol

reviews.name: Di Zafurova
reviews.title: Softest most absorbing diapers!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2024
reviews.review: These are one of the best diapers I have ever used! I used to use all types of diapers with my 1st and decided that pampers pure was my favorite, until I tried Coterie with my 2nd baby. Coterie was by far the best when it comes to fit, softness, and absorbency. These diapers (Pura) are my absolute favorite because they are clean, made without any chlorine and all the chemicals which exist in most American diapers. The only problem I have with these is that they don’t have the best fit which caused some leaks. My son wears size 3 and as the sizes increased I noticed more leaks because of the fit. Otherwise, if these diapers had elastics and a better fit they would be the most superior. Not once, even after a 10+ hour sleep, have they been wet when I opened to change my baby! He always stays super dry in these and if it wasn’t for the fit they would be better than Coterie. Unfortunately I have to go back to Coterie because the diapers moves a lot as my baby grows. The price is also perfect, costs less than most big brand diapers while outperforming. I wish they work on it and make it more snuggly, because I can’t wait to switch these with my coterie diapers.

reviews.name: Elilove
reviews.title: Super soft
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2024
reviews.review: The first thing I noticed about these diapers is how soft they are compared to the current Huggies brand I was using. They do keep baby's skin dry to touch. Unfortunately I wanted to use them overnight but they came off completely two times and I don't feel like they are strong enough to last the night with a toddler. My daughter sleeps with a sleep sack on and one morning the diaper was by her feet and she was soaked and another time one of the straps came off and she was a little wet by the time I checked her diaper in the morning. The straps also do not have grip all the way to tip where you pull it its missing the grip part not sure why. However, despite my bad experience overnight, I will order a size bigger next time for my toddler and give it another try. I am definitely going to buy these again for my newborn and give them a try just because I love how soft they are (:

reviews.name: Sumitra Shrestha
reviews.title: Not a big fan
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2024
reviews.review: I don’t think I’d buy this brand again as it gave rashes to my daughter

reviews.name: Shopper123
reviews.title: Decent, clean option
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2024
reviews.review:
PRO:
- Clean. Per Mamavation’s testing, inside non-detect organic fluorine, outside non-detect organic fluorine. Fluorine is the indicator used to detect PFAS, forever chemicals.
- Made in Europe.
- Affordable, especially for a clean brand.
- Lays flat when open, making diaper changes a little easier. Personally, I hate Huggies because it bunches and curls when I’m trying to slide it under baby for diaper changes.

CON:
Not as absorbent as others. My baby peed and pooped in them over the course of a 2 hour period and I felt like it was at max capacity. Definitely not as absorbent as Coterie, Pampers Pure or Rascals, which are my three preferred diapers for a variety of reasons.

reviews.name: Christyn Garber
reviews.title: Great TCF diaper choice
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2024
reviews.review: Size 1 did not fit my 6.5 pound baby until around 8 pounds, so I would definitely not recommend for a 4-7 pound baby. Diapers are fluffy and cute, no leaks or blowouts (though we don't regularly use disposables and use EC part time), and fit well now that baby is at the upper weight range. Price and availability is great compared to some other TCF brands. The tabs stick very strong so repositioning them can be a pain and end up tearing up the diaper a little bit. Diapers tend to slip down a little on my baby with movement and these are no exception. Will probably buy again next time because of price and ease of access!

reviews.name: Lay
reviews.title: Good
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2024
reviews.review: Soft good quality diapers.. they just run small is only downside

reviews.name: jazzmin
reviews.title: Run small
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2024
reviews.review: Good quality very soft. They run small in size other wise great diapers. They are absorbing and baby loves them .

reviews.name: M
reviews.title: Received the wrong size
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2024
reviews.review: I ordered a box of size 3 but received size 7. Still giving 4 stars because I’ve used these before and liked them.

reviews.name: Hannah G
reviews.title: Good but leaks overnight
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2024
reviews.review: Overall these diapers are great! They hold solids and liquids pretty well, but they do leak overnight. My baby didn’t have any skin irritation. The size is pretty spot on for my babies weight going by their weight chart. They feel pretty durable as well, just wish they held more liquid overnight.

reviews.name: Erin Michelle Engstrom
reviews.title: Fantastic Diaper!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2024
reviews.review: Love that it’s TCF, soft, and safe. The price point for the large pack is awesome and we will keep using these for future babies too. The main cons are they are not the most soft (still soft but Amazon’s diapers with the bear - Gentle Mama?? are softer) and they run a little small in my opinion. Not as small as Honest diapers, but not consistent with other brands (Mollie Moon, Huggies, Costco).

reviews.name: Beck
reviews.title: So soft
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers are so soft. I was looking for an alternative to the diapers that I was using and these are great quality. They never gave my toddler a rash and he didn’t mind wearing them at all. The one issue I encountered is that where ever the pee landed it stayed. It kept them from leaking which is excellent, but it made them sag a little more than what I had previously used. Over all I would buy them again and think they are nice quality.

reviews.name: Meredith A.
reviews.title: Good but not amazing
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2024
reviews.review: I bought these when I ran out of my Kudos diapers. I do like that they are soft and stretchy and non toxic. But they aren't as absorbent as the Kudos brand. I wouldn't trust them for overnight. But they are great as a backup diaper and a great affordable option.

reviews.name: Abbigail Tygart
reviews.title: A good nontoxic option
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2024
reviews.review: I thought these were really soft on my baby’s bottom! Sometimes the material seemed to shed though.

reviews.name: adrina
reviews.title: Love these
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2024
reviews.review: I really like these diapers, they are super soft. I wouldn't use them for overnight, we have had leaks.

reviews.name: Christine
reviews.title: Absorbent and Soft Diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2024
reviews.review: I like Pura diapers for my baby. I really like the softness of these diapers, and I think they are very comfortable for my baby to wear. They have great absorbency for 12 hours. However, I do wish they had a wetness indicator.

reviews.name: Daniel
reviews.title: Best non toxic diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2024
reviews.review: I am so glad I found these diapers. They are inexpensive and work very well for my toddler. She has not had any leaks with these, as soon as we used honest diapers again leak after leak each night. We’ve been using Honest at the moment because these have been out of stock for a few weeks. Only downside!!

reviews.name: Mari D
reviews.title: Great diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers are perfect especially for my busy toddler and newborn. There is no powdery smell like many other baby products. My children fit comfortably in them and even after my toddler soils them while playing for extended periods, they hold up well. We haven’t had any blowouts or leaks and there doesn’t seem to be anything added making them irritable to their skin.

reviews.name: Anna
reviews.title: Very soft, natural-feeling, but gape at back
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2024
reviews.review: I love how natural these feel, very soft, no scent. Baby doesn’t get rashes while using. But they do gape out at the back. Unlike other brands that are stretchy/cinched at the back these are not. If baby isn’t wearing clothing and is sitting up you get a very clear view down the back of the diaper! Would love a poo pocket added here and some cinching to hold “stuff” in.

reviews.name: Macy
reviews.title: Not a bad choice
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2024
reviews.review: Loved how soft these were, and the price can’t be beat. My biggest complaint is as soon as my baby peed I could smell it, which isn’t a terrible thing that’s how I knew she needed changed since there is no stripe but the smell was too much. Plus we had two blowouts in these compared to a similar brand.

reviews.name: Taylor McEntire
reviews.title: Very soft
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers are so soft. I wanted to love them but poop consistently comes out the leg holes. I love that they are non toxic, so it might just be the trade off.

reviews.name: Marsue
reviews.title: Okay
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2024
reviews.review: Great quality, but didn't love how thin they seemed. Didn't seem to hold as much as others I have tried fpr my baby. I did like that they are a cleaner option!

reviews.name: Santastically Yours
reviews.title: No overflow!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2024
reviews.review: I got a size 6 for my 18month old nephew of average size. It has kept the messiness of "messes" In and good for overnight duty!

reviews.name: Wat
reviews.title: Love them
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2024
reviews.review: Love that these are TCF, very absorbent, only thing I’d wish they’d do is put a little line of material on the inside above the buttcheek area to help prevent blowouts. Almost every poop is a blowout if my child is on her back-whether in her swing, car seat, or flat on her back.

reviews.name: Noelle Kirschman_Flores
reviews.title: Best diapers ever!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2024
reviews.review: My son and I absolutely love these diapers!! They are so soft and way more comfortable than the name brand ones from the store. Would give a 5 star but was shipped a size 5 when I ordered a size 2 and I ordered ahead where I’d receive them in time right before I ran out but instead now I have to go return and buy other diapers from the store. A little disappointed but other than that no complaints about the diapers themselves. Also they work great for over night sleep. So no buying day and night diapers or doubling up.

reviews.name: MzMaxxy
reviews.title: Not Bad
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2024
reviews.review: Sizing is pretty good. My little one is getting into a size 3 so these work but we would need to go up to the next size. They feel different, lighter and thinner than most diapers we have tried. I was hesitant to use them overnight but no leaks. Because they are thinner, putting them on can be tricky but I got use to it.

reviews.name: Verified buyer
reviews.title: PRETTY GOOD
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2024
reviews.review: I was not expecting to like these because my first thought when I saw these were "they are too THIN! They are thin but they actually do hold a lot, they can overload at night and leak but throughout the day they are excellent and hold a lot of pee. They are very soft and feel like COTTON! I love these on my baby and will definitely be re purchasing.

reviews.name: Sydney
reviews.title: Soft diaper!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2024
reviews.review: Super soft diaper! It felt more true to size than the diapers we were using previously. Held up really well, but the diaper does become almost translucent when full which made me think it was too full- and we change very regularly. My son has super sensitive skin and these didn’t irritate him at all.

reviews.name: L
reviews.title: Missing Indicator mark in diaper
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2024
reviews.review: There is no indicator line in an any of the size 3. It’s difficult to identify whether if it is a wet diaper or not.

reviews.name: Bob Moynihan
reviews.title: Clean diaper
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2024
reviews.review: Chose this product for its non toxic ingredients especially being totally chlorine free since it is in constant contact with babies skin. We have no rashes or redness since starting this brand & will continue to purchase. They feel thin compared to other diapers on the market but fit great & can hold a large amount, they perform very well with mobile babies. There is no scent to these which we appreciate

reviews.name: Juan C.
reviews.title: Favorite
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2024
reviews.review: I love these diapers! Barely any blowout or leaks! Clean diapers, my only complaint is that there is no wet line indicator

reviews.name: Felicity Bryan
reviews.title: Great but..
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers are extremely soft and TCF with clean ingredients however it’s annoying they stop including the wetness indicator line starting at size 3. If anything, I need the indicator line as they’re older since they can go longer in between changes. I’d say they’re extremely absorbent but if you don’t have the right size the babes have blowouts easily

reviews.name: Briana MacKenzie
reviews.title: Very soft
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2024
reviews.review: I am trying these diaper after honest diaper moved away from tcf. I love how soft these diapers are but I feel like they are very wide and I have a hard time getting them on my baby snuggly. I don’t know if a bigger size would be more proportional but overall I like these diapers and have purchased them in a larger size for future use.

reviews.name: Von The Flower
reviews.title: Budget Friendly
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2024
reviews.review: I usually purchase a more expensive eco friendly brand. These diapers are the next best thing…High performance, does sag after usage so the appearance isn’t great; but I’m glad the product had no effect on my daughter’s sensitive skin.

reviews.name: Roaringharp
reviews.title: Love these diapers!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2024
reviews.review: I really like these diapers. They are toxin free with a good price point and very soft! I would prefer if they were plain white but it's hard to come across plain disposable diapers. They have decent thickness and are pretty absorbent. My son still gets rashes but that may not be because of the diaper. I also love that they come in a paper bag that I can recycle, so it's environmentally friendly 😃

reviews.name: Viktoriya Deleanu
reviews.title: Good quality
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2024
reviews.review: Love these diapers for their ingredients, but they don’t stay dry as long as some of the other brands with bad ingredients. Need diaper change more often.

reviews.name: Ruby Santana
reviews.title: Good in a pinch.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2024
reviews.review: Had these delivered straight to my babysitters house when she ran out last minute. No complaints. Held together and didn’t leak.

reviews.name: Madison
reviews.title: Very soft
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2024
reviews.review: Incredibly soft diapers. I wouldn't recommend as overnight diapers if you have a baby who sleeps a bit longer. Otherwise, I think they're a relatively good diaper, especially for being organic. Only complaint is that I felt the fit on my specific baby wasn't perfect so the Velcro part sat a little low (even with adjustment) causing it to sometimes dig into my baby's thigh.

reviews.name: tiffany torrisi
reviews.title: Decent price good materials
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2024
reviews.review: When I bought these I felt like they were a decent price and decent materials, however once my son used them he would complain about them itching between his legs had to stop using. Other than that, for the time that he did use them, we did not experience any leaks etc.

reviews.name: Ellen Spangler
reviews.title: Quality clean diaper for lowest price
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2024
reviews.review: Truly clean diapers can be so expensive but these are a quality diaper for an affordable price! The fit can be tricky to figure out - they run a little small compared to other brands the same size. If they’re too small they will leak a lot. But once you get size right they work great!

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Works okay
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2024
reviews.review: We love that these diapers are non toxic and works well for sensitive skin. My only complaint is that they don’t work well for toddlers who are on the go all the time…they leak way too much. If they had a snugger waist band/fit they would be the best diaper

reviews.name: Mariz
reviews.title: Un poco decepcionada
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2024
reviews.review: En realidad pensé que sería como la marca famosas que es un poco más cara solo por unos 10 pañales menos pero creo que lo valen ya que eso si mantiene a mi bebé sin fugas y muy seco en comparación con estos yo diría que le falta mejorar el ancho del pañal y alguna capa para mantener seco al bebé por lo de más es un material muy suave y se siente bien .

reviews.name: Danielle G.
reviews.title: great diapers but...
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2024
reviews.review: i think these diapers are amazing for newborns and little babies but as for 1yr + not so much not aborbent enough! but great for baby stage

reviews.name: Michelle McCullough
reviews.title: Phenomenal and Affordable TCF Diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2024
reviews.review: I love these diapers! They are pillowy soft, and don’t smell chemical-y like other diaper brands. I did experience some blowouts, and they could be wider on the tabs for a better fit. Overall a great affordable option for TCF diapers! Just a tad more expensive than Honest Co., but I made the switch after they went back to ECF manufacturing.

reviews.name: kmo
reviews.title: Good diaper random pricing
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.review: Annoying that size 1-3 are roughly 30 something cent a diaper but you move up to size 4 and they become 50 something cents a diaper!? They are more absorbent than I expected! Happy I found them, I use them in the day. I still use a different brand overnight that is not as clean a brand but more absorbent. Wish pricing would stay in 30 cents per diaper range!

reviews.name: C
reviews.title: Decent clean diaper
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.review: Love the softness and stretchy band to these diapers. I don't feel like they hold as much as millie moon (our preferred diaper), but they're still a good choice when I can't get millie moon. They're also a more "clean" option than our preferred, but not great for nighttime.

reviews.name: JENNIFER P.
reviews.title: Great diaper for a great price!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2024
reviews.review: As a grandmother , primary care giver, I’m really loving these diapers. Very soft and price fits my budget. I think the performance out does a lot of the diapers out on the market

reviews.name: Coya
reviews.title: Super soft and absorbent
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2024
reviews.review: Love these , they literally absorbs super good that my baby’s skin isn’t moist even when she has a wet diapers. There so soft and she seems a lot more comfy in them. I use to use Huggies but this is my new favorite brand

reviews.name: Emily Mobray
reviews.title: Good enough
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2024
reviews.review: No leaks or anything. They will sag at where the sticky part/when you connect them. But for the price point and the earth friendliness, they’re worth it

reviews.name: M.S.
reviews.title: Good quality
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2024
reviews.review: Good product. No leaks or issues. Good price.

reviews.name: Jacob
reviews.title: Nice diapers but need bigger size
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2024
reviews.review: Need bigger size and also in the diaper broke revealing the gel like substances. I thought it’s totally cotton.

reviews.name: michelle marie hill
reviews.title: Run big
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2024
reviews.review: I ordered these for my daughter as she was needing newborn diapers and unfortunately these are way bigger . They are more like a size 1 compared too like Huggies .

reviews.name: Nicole R
reviews.title: Very soft good quality
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2024
reviews.review: Very soft and i love the quality just they leak very fast you need to change your baby more times.

reviews.name: nicole
reviews.title: Size Up
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.review: This feels like a great quality diaper, it is cheaper than pampers, and they feel better then pampers, however, the weight limit on the diapers are pretty different. In pampers we are in a size one which is a weight 8-14 pounds, and in these we had to go to a size 2 to approximately get that same weight. I will however continue purchasing these. Just keep the weight limit in mind when purchasing.

reviews.name: AmberTrueAK
reviews.title: 🌎♻️ conscious yes, but 🚫🌛 not for overnight
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.review:
Great for an eco and material conscious diaper. These are NOT overnight diapers. They hold like Hello Bellos

My 9-month-old, who wears a size 7 because he's got the thiccccckest turkey thighs, he wears Walmart's Rascal + Friends over nights, and then I have him in the Puras during the day. ☯️

Both brands have accommodating waistbands.

reviews.name: Jose Silva-Aguilar
reviews.title: Diaper
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2024
reviews.review: Product is pretty good and the price

reviews.name: Christine
reviews.title: Work great.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.review: They’re great affordable diapers, very soft. I took 1 star off because it says they last 12 hours but they are horrible as overnight diapers.

reviews.name: Carlee Selby
reviews.title: Haven’t used yet, but seem like decent diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.review:
These diapers are very soft and the sizing seems to be pretty on par with other brands. There is no elastic on the back of the diaper which may cause issues or more blowouts for some. Also the inside of the diaper makes me worry it won’t be very absorbent. But I’ll try to update after we use them if I remember!

*added photos for those like me that like to see the product :)

reviews.name: Guadalupe Díaz
reviews.title: Pequeños en talla
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.review: Pode una talla más a la normal yo pedí 6 pero parecían ser 5

reviews.name: Kayleigh
reviews.title: Only tried one so far
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.review: They're HUGE. For size 1 newborn, it says as low as 4 pounds but my 7 pounds preemie was swimming in them. We'll wait a bit until we try them again but I wanted to let it be known that they're larger than normal diapers. They are really soft tho and seem to hold a lot.

reviews.name: Abbey Mateer
reviews.title: Clean, Nontoxic diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.review: Good, clean alternative. They hold liquid well. Super soft, but a bit flimsy feeling.

reviews.name: Roxana Robinson
reviews.title: Very thin
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.review: I got this diapers due to the price, and I really wanted to try them. They are very thin to touch, but so far everything was good, no blowouts.

reviews.name: L. Kitahara
reviews.title: Softest diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.review: Very soft and luxurious diapers. Taking a star off because I did notice a little leakage around leg openings but it could have been a fit issue.

reviews.name: Monica Townsend
reviews.title: Ours newborn
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2024
reviews.review: Bigger than expected

reviews.name: Melissa Elledge
reviews.title: Big
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers are huge. I just brought home my 7lb baby and these diapers are way, way too big. No way could they ever fit a smaller baby. I have to fold the top down and close the Velcro overlapping each other and it is still nearly falling off. A proper newborn size is needed for these diapers. 4-11 lbs is too broad of a size range.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: High ranking
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2024
reviews.review: Lightweight and soft. High back prevents stool blowouts. Very absorbant holding urine overnight but had occasional urine leaks during the day, not sure if this may be because of sizing or not putting diaper on tight enough. Overall for cost, simplicity of design aesthetically and functionally, sustainability, this is a top choice as it is comparable to top brands

reviews.name: Marci
reviews.title: Great value, awesome diaper!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2024
reviews.review:
We’ve tried a variety of diapers from Pampers to Coterie. I would rank this as one of my top 3, especially for the price!

I will say as our grandbaby outgrows the diapers the fit is bad and causes leaks. We sized up, no leaks. I will keep buying these for alternatives. No chlorine, wetness indicator doesn’t always show up but no worries. Price point is great for a better quality diaper.

reviews.name: Christine Walker
reviews.title: TCF and the right price
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2024
reviews.review: As a new mom, I was so upset feeling like I either had to choose between the health of my baby (avoiding bad chemicals) or being able to afford to diaper my child. Cloth diapers weren’t going to be a good option for our family. I’m SO glad I found these! They are actually total chlorine free with no harsh chemicals, environmentally friendly, and compete with the cost of budget diapers. 👍🏻 They were too big for my little one at first (she was under 6lbs. at birth), but we’ve been using them for 2.5 months now, and I’m very happy with them. They contain blow outs well, but occasionally leak up her back. Other than that, she’s almost 4 months old and has never had any diaper rash or irritation, and she’s sleeping thru the night in them. I’ll be sticking with this brand!

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.title: Good diapers overall
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.review: I appreciate that these are affordable and clean diapers. They might need improvements in absorbency and overall quality though but they do the job and we haven’t had any rashes or leaks so far. I definitely will order again!

reviews.name: Teo
reviews.title: Super soft and non toxic
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2024
reviews.review: I love the price for these diapers and that they are nontoxic and are completely TCF. I would say that the observancy is not as good as the swaddlers for example, but if you keep changing them as they wet, you’ll be fine. They’re not very good for overnights especially if your baby takes one to two bottles at night because they will leak but we love the softness and the absorbency is OK and the mean and most important part is that I can get them on Amazon and they are nontoxic for my son. We will also be using these for our newborn.

reviews.name: P🎀
reviews.title: Pay attention to weight over sizing
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2024
reviews.review: The print is really cute and was perfect for my diaper bouquets i made for a baby shower. The packaging is paper and eco friendly. The material is thick and high quality and seem to be super absorbent. I got them on sale so they are a good value for the money. I paid $15 for 64 diapers which is a steal. My only compliant is the sizing. I ordered A size 1 thinking it would be an actual size 1 diaper. But their size 1 is actually considered to be newborn size 4-11 pounds. Which, if you're a mom you know babies don't stay in this size for very long. So definitely pay attention to the weight restrictions over the actual sizing of the diaper. Because these size 1s were very small. I would size up from what you intended on purchasing but again, pay attention to the weight limits.

reviews.name: Christine Walker
reviews.title: TCF and the right price
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2024
reviews.review: As a new mom, I was so upset feeling like I either had to choose between the health of my baby (avoiding bad chemicals) or being able to afford to diaper my child. Cloth diapers weren’t going to be a good option for our family. I’m SO glad I found these! They are actually total chlorine free with no harsh chemicals, environmentally friendly, and compete with the cost of budget diapers. 👍🏻 They were too big for my little one at first (she was under 6lbs. at birth), but we’ve been using them for 2.5 months now, and I’m very happy with them. They contain blow outs well, but occasionally leak up her back. Other than that, she’s almost 4 months old and has never had any diaper rash or irritation, and she’s sleeping thru the night in them. I’ll be sticking with this brand!

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.title: Good diapers overall
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.review: I appreciate that these are affordable and clean diapers. They might need improvements in absorbency and overall quality though but they do the job and we haven’t had any rashes or leaks so far. I definitely will order again!

reviews.name: Teo
reviews.title: Super soft and non toxic
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2024
reviews.review: I love the price for these diapers and that they are nontoxic and are completely TCF. I would say that the observancy is not as good as the swaddlers for example, but if you keep changing them as they wet, you’ll be fine. They’re not very good for overnights especially if your baby takes one to two bottles at night because they will leak but we love the softness and the absorbency is OK and the mean and most important part is that I can get them on Amazon and they are nontoxic for my son. We will also be using these for our newborn.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Too big
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2025
reviews.review: These most certainly do not fit my 5 1/2 lbs baby. They seem nice and soft but can’t use until she probably gains atleast 3 more lbs.

reviews.name: Carter Polo
reviews.title: OPENED diapers taped up!!!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2024
reviews.review: This is unbelievable that this was packaged up and gave the okay to sell. I had a bad dealing when the package already came dented and as dirty as it is…. I stated taking out the packs of diapers and noticed one of the diaper packages was TAPED BACK UP!!! I wouldn’t even use used underwear even if it was cleaned and bleached… what makes you think I feel safe putting this opened package of diapers near my daughter’s private parts where we don’t even know the reason as to why it was taped. Unfortunately I can’t do a full return because we are out of diapers so I will need to use the ones that weren’t damaged but I’m furious and disappointed that I spent all this money when we are already struggling. These are pretty much the only diapers that don’t irritate my daughter and we loved this brand but I’m thoroughly dissatisfied so I might have to start looking at other brands unfortunately.

reviews.name: Lorena Rodríguez
reviews.title: Not the best diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2025
reviews.review: Good quality but not my favorite product. I will give it a try again soon, they have really good materials.

reviews.name: Brandon and CreeAnn Shaffer
reviews.title: They may send incorrect size
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2025
reviews.review: Great diapers but beware… I ordered a size 1 they sent me a size 6… pain in the butt

reviews.name: Caroline
reviews.title: Frequent leaks
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2025
reviews.review: I like the materials and the cost but they have leaked several times and I haven’t had that issue with the other brand we have used for years.

reviews.name: Hailey
reviews.title: Not Like I Remember Them
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2024
reviews.review:
We are a cloth diapering family BUT do disposables at night for the sake of longer stretches of sleep. We used them with our first and loved them! I’m so disappointed to see they now have a wetness indicator?? Unnecessary chemicals in diapers. When did this change? Ugh! Extremely disappointing since parents who buy this brand are trying to buy a cleaner diaper. The fact that changed makes me question the cleanness of the diaper and if anything else changed. So far she hasn’t gotten any rash, so hoping that stays the same.

The newborn size is also extremely large. Our baby was born at 7lb 2oz. I can tell you she was swimming in these diapers at first. I find it extremely hard to believe they would fit a 4lb baby.

reviews.name: Andrea Zubia
reviews.title: Run small
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2025
reviews.review:
Took a couple of days shy of a month to deliver. By the time I received them, my baby no longer fit in them.
They are super soft and my baby who has eczema did not react to it.
They run small

reviews.name: Kaitlin
reviews.title: Not as clean as it seems.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2024
reviews.review: As much as I wanted to like these diapers due to lack of blowouts and the comfortable way they fit, I initially was not aware that the inner top sheet is plastic. They have great absorbency, good adhesive strength, fabulous value for money, but I can't get past the plastic part. My baby lives in these 24/7 with constant skin contact, so I need to make a conscious decision about the type of diapers I use. Change the inner top sheet & I'll come back to this brand! And you'll be helping to make for healthier babies!

reviews.name: Des
reviews.title: The sizing makes no sense to me
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2024
reviews.review: These feel great and are pretty absorbent which are the upsides. My daughter is about 7 lbs and she was swimming in these. They were so big that her pee and poo just spilled out through the legs and soaked her clothes. No stretchy waistband is also a downside. I really don’t get how these can be rated for a baby as small as 4 lbs. I will have to try these again when she’s much bigger and see how they perform then

reviews.name: Britny
reviews.title: Love but sadly no blowout protection
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2024
reviews.review: I really love these diapers, how soft they are and the non toxic aspects are my favorite but it’s so frustrating there is hardly any blowout protection in the back area. The back area doesn’t have any scrunch or extra layer to prevent blowouts going up the back. Every time my baby is wearing these it just goes straight up her back or even her front. 😫 If that part was improved I would absolutely keep buying these but until then it’s just not worth how many stained clothes a day I will end up with.

reviews.name: Haley
reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up well
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2024
reviews.review: I wanted to like these because they are extremely soft and we had no blowouts with them but the quality isn’t all there. The straps rip off extremely easily, I lost count on how many diapers from the pack were thrown out because while putting them on the strap broke off and I couldn’t secure the diaper. The hold capacity is great but it’s a waste of money to toss so many diapers. I think they’d be perfect if the material for the straps were a bit stronger.

reviews.name: FashionLexx
reviews.title: WONDERFUL Diapers but horrible shipping
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2024
reviews.review:
These diapers were great especially since they are TCF. The brands commitment to the environment followed through to packaging, made from paper instead of your usual plastic. The design was simple and cute with good coverage as well. Also, the price was more than worth it.

However, they definitely need to work on the order fulfillment aspect of things because my experience was simply horrible. I experienced both delayed shipping and delivery.

reviews.name: shawna p young
reviews.title: Don’t wear well
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2024
reviews.review:
I liked that these had no strange smell like some diapers. They were soft and didn’t have issues with leaking but they were s
For the size and they didn’t stay put. The tab wasn’t very strong and the diaper ended up looking like a sumo wrestler diaper in the front in a short ammt of time. Definitly not a good option especially for a moving crawling baby. They barely stayed in place

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Runs Large
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2024
reviews.review:
My baby was born just 7lbs and then dropped into the 6lb range. We needed clean diapers that were very small. My baby was skinny so in premie sizes at the hospital. These came once we got home and were HUGE! No 4lb baby would ever fit in this. He is now about a month old and over 8lbs and is just fitting them. However, they leak so easily. He pooped and when I changed his about 20 minutes later it was already seeping through the diaper.
They are very soft though and my baby seems to be comfortable in them. I will finish using what I have but only for daytime and at home.

reviews.name: L Spencer
reviews.title: Great Backup Diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2024
reviews.review:
I love that they are non-toxic. They did the trick when we ran out of our normal brand.

Cons: They aren’t leak free (maybe its the narrow design). We change frequently and had A LOT more accidents. One day it didn’t survive the car ride to pick big bro up from school. Lastly, they could be more absorbant. Our little one has super sensitive skin and started to break out.

reviews.name: Hannuman Bull
reviews.title: Falls Apart in Two Hours
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2024
reviews.review:
I want to love these diapers.
I love how soft they are,how simple their design in and how safe they are.

I don't love how the inside seam(if that's what it's called?) falls apart. Then the gel filling is all over my baby's crotch and butt. It's safe but bothersome. I end up having to rinse off my baby in the tub since it takes time wiping and picking it off. My baby is a screeching fighter on the changing table so I need to be quick.

I thought maybe they had it on too long and pee made it burst but Id change them after an hour and it seems to come apart. The longer the more gel particles. So I didn't even try using it over night

reviews.name: Mark
reviews.title: Will not order again
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers are SO soft and I love that they are TCF but they don’t absorb very well, there isn’t a pee indicator line and we had a mild poopy diaper leak out of the leg socket because it doesn’t fit tight enough around my baby’s legs. Size 4 diaper and my baby is 22-23lbs. I wanted to try them and maybe they would work better if my baby was closer to the higher end of the weight range for the size but unfortunately I won’t purchase again.

reviews.name: BIanca V
reviews.title: Good daytime diapers, bad nighttime diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2024
reviews.review: I wanted to love these diapers since they are TCF diapers but after 4 nighttime diapers that soaked through (my baby hasn’t soaked through a diaper since he was 2-3 months old and he’s 13 months now for reference), it’s tough to love them. I will say that they were great during daytime. They are very soft and didn’t seem to bother my son at all. They held the urine in well but I also do not let my son go longer than 1.5 hours without a diaper change except at night. Maybe I need to size up because I found them to be on the snugger side when compared to pampers swaddlers FYI. My son wears a size 4 which is what I ordered in pura diapers but maybe he needed a size 5 and maybe that’s why we had 4 different instances where he soaked through the pura diapers at night. I’ll definitely edit this review if I decide to size up and give them another shot!

reviews.name: Ally
reviews.title: Day time diapers, Definitely not night time diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2024
reviews.review: I ordered these diapers to try out as a cheaper option. I usually get pampers pure or Kirkland brand for reference. Never had a leak at night ever. These have leaked two nights in a row. So definitely won’t be putting them on her at night anymore. I will agree with another reviewer that they are decent day time diapers. However, my daughter also doesn’t go longer than 2 hours without a change during the day. I will also say, one perk is that these diapers are SUPER soft and didn’t cause any issues for my daughter’s skin and she is sensitive. I also did size up to a 5 rather than the 4 I normally get in pampers and Kirkland so I don’t believe that is the issue.

reviews.name: Carissa james
reviews.title: Good diapers, shipping issues
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2024
reviews.review: Love the product. I actually use them for night time diapers as well because are very leak proof, but I have been sent the wrong size two times in a row now. So disappointing

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Clean label but not leak proof
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2024
reviews.review:
Pros: they're clean product, affordable price, my kid isn't sensitive to them, texture feels fine.
Cons: the straps fall apart quickly, they don't hold a lot without leaking - for example if we fall asleep before getting changed and urinate a lot, we're having to change the outfit after waking. It's not like they're leaking thru the diaper itself but like it's full and the pee just runs out the openings. My kid feeds thru the night so we can't use them overnight without waking up soaked.
I think the lack of chemicals makes them worth buying for disposable diapers but they definitely require more frequent changes. I still have to use pampers overnight.

reviews.name: Taylor Small
reviews.title: Did not meet expectations
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2024
reviews.review:
Pro:
Company states they are total chlorine free. (This isn’t something I care about, but many people do)
Company is a B Corp.
Diaper itself is soft.

Con:
No wet indicator.
Not all that absorbent.
Blow outs.

Overall:
It’s a diaper. It didn’t meet the expectations I had based on reviews and marketing. It’s an average diaper but not worth the price in my opinion.

reviews.name: Maeve Bowman
reviews.title: Nice quality but not for every baby
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2024
reviews.review: I really wanted to like these diapers because of their softness and what they are made of. But unfortunately they just don’t seem to work for my little boy. I had to change the diapers quite often, every two hours or so, because they seem to fill up so quickly versus MillieMoon which we usually use. This is just not cost effective since it’s far fewer diapers for a higher cost. I would say if you have a big pee-er or it’s hot and they are drinking a lot of water, this is not the best diaper to choose.

reviews.name: Rachel
reviews.title: I really wanted them to work...
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2024
reviews.review: I really wanted these diapers to work for my kiddo. I like how "clean" of a diaper they are but unfortunately within the first hour my kiddo had an allergic reaction.

reviews.name: Tammy H
reviews.title: Sizing seems off
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2024
reviews.review: I bought size two knowing I have big babies. Ours was 10 lbs at birth, and he was swimming in these. They still fit him a bit oversized honestly and he’s 12 lbs now. They’re really thin, but that seems to be the case with all of the non toxic diapers I’ve tried this round.

reviews.name: VICTORIAETHRIFTS
reviews.title: New fragrance smell/odor
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2024
reviews.review: Loved these as a TCF option but it now has a strong fragrance. I won’t repurchase for that reason but if that doesn’t bother you, they are pretty durable. They were a bit big for my newborn at first but she grew into them.

reviews.name: Jagpalpreet sekhon
reviews.title: Great material but horrible durability
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2024
reviews.review: The material of these diapers are amazing. However the durability is absolutely horrible. At least for my toddler that wears a size 5. As soon as she goes number 1 I have to change her diaper immediately since these diapers “explode” or better said rip and before you know it you have a ton of the inside of the diaper all over your toddlers bum. They are like tiny little beefs that go everywhere. It’s a nightmare. I really wanted to love these diapers and I would keep using them if it weren’t for the lack of durability.

reviews.name: Sam
reviews.title: Sizing is different from leading brands
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2024
reviews.review:
I purchased a size 1 (which is their NEWBORN size 4lbs+). They are a bit big for newborns (see picture). First diaper is newborn size from a leading brand, followed by Pura brand size 1/newborn, and then a size 1 diaper in another leading brand. I still put them on my 3 week old (~6lbs) and they're a bit big.

Pros: super soft, non irritable, belly button cutout.

Cons: newborn size too big for an actual newborn...let alone a 4lb baby. Leak proof sides aren't too effective especially for that newborn yellow runny stool. My baby had a bowl movement and it almost went through the sides. Doesn't absorb too well.

I will probably not try this brand again until my baby is older and bowl movements are solid.

reviews.name: Erin
reviews.title: Wrong Item
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2024
reviews.review: I ordered a size 2 and received a size 5. The first order I requested a replacement to be sent and received a size 5 again. Not sure if something is wrong in their system, but just keep in mind that you may receive the wrong item. Other than that, the diapers are great!

reviews.name: Rebecca YD
reviews.title: Sizing
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2024
reviews.review: I like how the product feels. However the sizing didn’t work for us. At 7lbs, it was way too big for my baby when she was a newborn and now at 9.5lbs, the part with absorbent material doesnt cover her butt completely. I’m using what I have up but only when I know we will be at home and will be doing frequent changes. Does not hold a lot of pee so definitely not for overnight use.

reviews.name: Gemma
reviews.title: We like these, but… Wrong size was delivered.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2024
reviews.review: We like these clean diapers and have ordered several times, however; the wrong size was sent. I didn’t realize it until I was putting them on my toddler and saw the size 4 on the diaper. We ordered size 7’s. I cannot find info on how to exchange for a different size.

reviews.name: Brittany Barbehenn
reviews.title: Soft but not as absorbent
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2024
reviews.review: These are cute and very soft but they don’t absorb as well as other diapers and have been causing lots of super early wakes. The smell of urine coming through them is also unbearably strong. On the up side I do think it’s helping some toilet communication!

reviews.name: Sakxit
reviews.title: Are they good for sensitive? Yes. Good? Eh
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2024
reviews.review: Theyre okay, my little one didnt have a reaction like she normally does, but again they arent very good if youre going out somewhere or during bedtime. The top of the diaper doesnt close fully which leaves a huge gaping spot, and it doesnt matter the size either, it still remains. Which means if theyre laying down or they got a big number two youre screwed

reviews.name: Liz Santacruz
reviews.title: I really wanted to like these
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2024
reviews.review: I really wanted to like these. The packaging is so cute, and love how they wrap their packaging in paper instead of plastic. Despite being organic and free from all the junk you don't want on your baby's skin. these diapers did not hold up. We experienced too many leaks and blow outs. I'll be going back to our previous diaper brand.

reviews.name: MrsLee
reviews.title: Clean
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers are good, clean, chemical free but they leak a lot. My daughter is 26lbs and we purchased size 4 which is her size. However, they were shaped strange and a bit big. We tried size 3 but those were too tight. So now we have half a pack just sitting. We are now onto Coterie and Lilydoo.

reviews.name: Linda Lou
reviews.title: Leaks
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2024
reviews.review: Baby can usually go through the night without a diaper change. With these, she leaked through all over the bed. They are more natural than other options, but there are still ingredients that I don't love. It says no fragrance on the package, but they smell. So hopefully that isn't from some sort of toxin.

reviews.name: Jäel Graham
reviews.title: Runs small
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2024
reviews.review: I love the ingredients in these diapers and they are so absorbant and soft on my babies skin. Unfortunately they do run small so I would suggest that if you have chubby baby's to size up two sizes . My baby is in size 5 diapers in pampers/huggies and I ordered size 6 and they are still much too small around the waist.

reviews.name: marilyn berchie
reviews.title: Not good for newborn blowouts
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers are okay for my toddler who doesnt pee as much and poop is more formed. For my newborn it was terrible his broke out in rashes and had too May blowouts as a breast feed baby with liquidy poo.

reviews.name: Danielle
reviews.title: Not a fan
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2024
reviews.review: These diapers seem extra cottony and thick. While my toddler needs extra leak protection, these are just a little too bulky.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Leak
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2024
reviews.review: Very soft, leak easier than any other diaper I have used.

reviews.name: D. Ewer
reviews.title: Rash
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2024
reviews.review: My little guy gets a rash with these but he does have sensitive skin.

reviews.name: Cloudzyy
reviews.title: Hard scratchy tabs
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2024
reviews.review: These would have been our go to’s, but the closing tabs are pokey and sharp. They scratched my LOs belly, and mine while holding/ picking up. Seems fixable, can’t see how they made it out the testing like this.

reviews.name: Bubbledee
reviews.title: Leaks for overnight
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2024
reviews.review: Doesn't stay on very well for my early walking toddler in size 3. Thet start to sag and come off right after she pees a few times. Better for babies who aren't on the move and jiggle their diapers off running around. I'm sure no one else has this problem because she's tiny running around at 10 months

reviews.name: Jazz W
reviews.title: Quality is okay
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2024
reviews.review: The fit of the diapers are nice. I like the bungee type part in the back. But I did notice that they easily come apart. I also don’t like that they don’t have the little yellow/blue strip like other big brand diapers so you can easily tell if it has been wet.

reviews.name: Vickie W.
reviews.title: Good Regular Diaper
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2024
reviews.review: This is a nice, very soft diaper for everyday use. I was looking for a chemical free diaper and this fits the bill. However, it is NOT a good diaper when the child is on a broad-sprectrum antibiotic. Clean up will require washing cloths in addition to getting the child clean. For a regular wet diaper, it's a sweet cloud of softness.

reviews.name: Ariana
reviews.title: Pros and cons
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2024
reviews.review:
Pros: soft, absorbent, good fit, affordability
Cons: made my daughter look like she belonged in the Antz movie cause the back was so puffy lol

reviews.name: Pat mullins
reviews.title: It was what I was advised to buy.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2024
reviews.review: I used it at the bottom of planters instead of rocks & it saves moisture and you use less soil.

reviews.name: lauren
reviews.title: Not real absorbant
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2024
reviews.review: Wasn’t happy with the absorption of these diapers. I feel like right after I put one on I had to change it. I like the concept of these diapers and the ingredients, but I will not purchase again because they leak so quickly.

reviews.name: Jesse
reviews.title: Good daytime diaper
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2024
reviews.review:
First thing I noticed about the diaper was how soft it was! None of the big brands can compare. Love them for a day time diaper.

They did not hold up so well at night. My daughter woke up soaked through.

reviews.name: Libby T
reviews.title: Leak almost every time
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2024
reviews.review: Disappointed in these diapers. They do not fit snugly. Almost every time there is a leak or poop getting onto baby’s clothes. Have not had this problem with any other diaper brand.

reviews.name: BreMcCall
reviews.title: Meh
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2024
reviews.review: These were okay. Appreciate that they are chlorine free. They are comparable size wise to hello bello I think. They are not absorbent enough for a heavy wetter or blowout queen!

reviews.name: Ari
reviews.title: Shorted me diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2024
reviews.review: I liked the product but I was supposed to receive 66 diapers 3 packs of 22 and I only received 3 packs of 18 diapers and than once I counted the diapers in packet there were only 16. Amazon refunded me they were great about it but it sucked that they shorted me diapers because I liked them.

reviews.name: Brooke Smasal
reviews.title: Good diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2024
reviews.review: I really liked these diapers and hoped they worked overnight for my son…they were great during the day. Super soft material and no diaper rashes! My son is a belly sleeper and would soak through them every night unfortunately.

reviews.name: Ash7474
reviews.title: Thin diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2024
reviews.review: They might be eco friendly but not efficient. We had to change diapers more frequently because they are very thin and didn't hold much. Definitely don't recommended for overnight use.

reviews.name: Nicole
reviews.title: Diapers are ok
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.review: I love that these diapers are considered non toxic but they have an odor to them especially if used for overnight when the baby may be in diapers for a little bit longer period of time

reviews.name: Ashley
reviews.title: Price for size 3 is higher than the other sizes 🤬
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.review: These are the literal only diapers on the market that don’t turn my baby girls entire diaper area bright red. Imagine my surprise when she sized up to size 3 and I find that those boxes cost almost 15$ more than every other size. Insanity. And horrible to do to parents like me who are just trying to do what’s best for their kid with sensitive skin.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Great except for leakage
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2024
reviews.review: I loved the idea of these, but they leaked through more often than other diapers.

reviews.name: NelleBelle
reviews.title: Economic environmentally friendly BUT
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2024
reviews.review: Economic environmentally friendly BUT Not blowout friendly :(

reviews.name: crazy redhead
reviews.title: Leak
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2024
reviews.review: Too many leaks

reviews.name: Victoria
reviews.title: Ok
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2024
reviews.review: These were okay they didn't hold much for night time

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Soft but not great absorbency or fit
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.review: Everything you need to know is in the title. They’re the softest diapers i’ve used. Confusingly, they are very wide. A little ridiculous for a baby. Also, my baby can’t sleep in these because she wakes up every time she wets them. You’re better off trying something else.

reviews.name: Julia Brockman
reviews.title: They're Ok
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.review: These diapers are ok. They weren't as absorbent or thick as some brands but they fit well and didn't have an unpleasant smell which was nice. If they were more absorbent I'd definitely be buying them again!

reviews.name: T W
reviews.title: Not very thick
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.review: The value is great, however, we have to change the diaper more often because the cotton on the inside separates easily and does not do very much absorbing. So, in the end it would probably just be worth the money to buy better quality diaper.

reviews.name: Tory 2 Cent
reviews.title: Size doesn't make any sense.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.review: These diapers say size 1 is for 4lbs-12lbs. My many is 6 pounds and these diapers are HUUUGE. I cannot imagine any 4lb baby could fit these the crotch area is about 5 inches wide. Cannot review the product for a few months until we can actually try it.

reviews.name: Krystal Smith
reviews.title: Not very absorbent
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.review: I like that these are TCF and very soft but the inner layer is very thin meaning twice as many diaper changes. Not the best for the environment or overnight absorbency.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Clean product but too many blowouts
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.review: Gave these a good try with two or three packs. I like that the ingredients appear to be very clean, but we had lots of blowouts compared to other brands.

reviews.name: Mike H.
reviews.title: Great diaper, poor fit
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.review: Not enough stretchy elastic material in the back leaving the back open for blow outs. Great diaper but would be much better if the back was tighter against baby's skin

reviews.name: Laurie Gaeta
reviews.title: No wetness indicator line on larger sizes
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.review: Super soft, great diaper but no wetness indicator line in size 3 and above

reviews.name: mona t.
reviews.title: Fit n durablilty
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.review: Waiting to see if they irritate her bottom

reviews.name: Jordan Paris
reviews.title: Stretchyyy
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2025
reviews.review: Love that they are clean. But for my 4 month old (wearing size 2) they just don’t fit to his body well and they stretch out a ton. He always leaks out the back because it gapes open.

reviews.name: Mark
reviews.title: Blow Outs
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2024
reviews.review: I wanted to love these. Great absorbency, cute design, and quality materials, however - baby had two huge blow outs that were not contained in the diaper, as there is no blow out barrier. It doesn't make sense to continue purchasing them for that reason.

reviews.name: MRS CARROT
reviews.title: Wanted to love because its so soft
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2024
reviews.review: These were a gift from a family member. We love how soft they are, but unfortunately they do not stand up to my newborns runny poo and frequent pees. We've had daily blowouts and leakage, even after just changing her. They're just a bit thin and not very elastic. Well unfortunately have to pass on this one and go back to bigger brand.

reviews.name: gabby
reviews.title: Mid
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2024
reviews.review: The diapers themselves are great, soft and absorbent. The biggest issue is there’s no scrunch on the back of the diaper or the sides so we were burdened with constant blowouts.

reviews.name: Hunter
reviews.title: love everything about them, minus sizing
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2024
reviews.review: Obviously no one really knows how big their baby is going to be when it’s born so it’s good to have size options! We had both size 1 & 2 the smallest offered for when we brought our girl home. She was 6lbs 12oz so the number one should have been perfect… the are HUGE on her. Like massive. The slipped off cause leaks twice, just way way to big to be a newborn. We had to run and grab another brand that isn’t as clean, but was accessible to us… and the size difference is laughable! A newborn diaper should be SMALL! Hoping she grows into them and fits well!

reviews.name: Delarno
reviews.title: Rash
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2024
reviews.review: My baby got a rash from these diapers, she has never had a rash before until we started using these. I wish they worked for us. Very absorbent, and affordable. They are kinda lose in the back, it doesn't have a snug fit in the back like other diapers. I switched back to Millie Moon & Proudly due to the rash my baby got from these.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Size 1
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2024
reviews.review: These were a gift. Size one says 4-11lbs? No way a 4lb baby fits these. My baby is 9lbs and they are massive on her and had a blowout. This would fit more of a 3/4 month baby!

reviews.name: adeline enochs
reviews.title: I wanted to love them
